“Ama, mutlina! Amat niohora o' di de riy lawna ida la Uplerlawna gaini ralamni pa la mtiamnia hapmu della a hoi miamni-ketar mamni maka mpualir niana. Riy id mai am di ta'en niana nwayotil pa rala ketarni tiy o' pa mtiamnia hapmu de.”
Nhi'noka Abrahama nwaltiora-nwaltieman la ina-ama re,
ne nakot la re: “La'pa miy mpiayow pa agodia ha'wu pa atiamnia la hande, de mrieiniana-mia'nana a wakwa'ku di pa mpiak lilili-maumuau lia Efron, Sohar a'nani,
totpa nala lienni no'a Makpela, mak kdella nhyi'ini onni de. Samounu de nal neka pa a'uwelia pa aghi'a la a lu'wu-a'nu ketarni la'a miy letgarmi, ne welli de apuair tetema.”
La' ler de de Efrona e namtatna la Heta duratni-waitni ina-ama re letgarni. Noka Efrona de nwahla Abrahama, de ina-ama mak kawok la leta puohrani gaini re ratlin reria.
Efron niwra: “Edonna ama, mutlin mai a'u. Nhyi' de agala tiy o'a, me lien de mana agal walia tiy o'a. Ne ina-ama rlin reri-rmat reri mak a'ukot di pede hota mtiamnia hapmu la gen die.”
Noka Abrahama nwaltiora-nwaltieman la ina-ama re,
ne nakot la Efron, de honona e ratlin reria, niwra: “Mitlin rerio! La'pa ompuayow de, apuairia nhyi'imu de welli. Mrieiniana hade mai a'u, totpena atiamni ha'wu la hande.”
Efrona nwahla Abrahama:
“Ame, yan muwenna me, mutlin pa ukota hadi. Plol toto'a de nohanna-taniarta di welli werta, de welli maha wawahra rahu wogata. Mere it mamaini pede emkadella pa mpuair niek wa. Mpuairia pa mtiamin neka hapmu la hande.”
Noka Abrahama nreiniana Efrona wakwakni, noma npairia maha wawahra la Efrona, liawanni emekwali maka ha nakot oleka re. Ina-ama mana ratlin reria de, maha wawahra rahu wogata, emolmolla mak kwadakna nhi'inde ret tiar lia.
Emkade nek la Efron nhyi'ini, nora lienni, na'itar wutu or-au ona mak kdella nhyi' di ralamni, lowan di honona mak kdella Makpela, la'a Mamre walli tipru
rala la Abrahama emolmolla tani ya'olu-yala'a, la'a Heta duratni-waitni gaini ralamni, de ina-ama mak kmai lia puohra leta gaini.
Nhor nioka Abrahama ntamnia hawni la'a liena mak kdella nhi'a Makpela, la'a Mamre walli tipru. Mamre de rwet walia la leta Hebron, ne etla Noha Kana'ana.
Emkadella la'a Heta duratni-waitni re rala la' Abraham nhyi'a nora lien mak kdella hande pa nhi'a la hoini-kietar wamueheni.
Orgahi-Orha'a Nara'a-napalga Abraham la'a hya'a-hya' to'owa, ne Abraham mana nhamto' wal wia.
Noka lera ida ne Abrahama nakot la hopopanni mak khi' ulu-o'ta la re'eni-tniarnu honona niwra: “Samounu de mkienia limmu la a lennu onni (emeka nhi'inde itsi' pa twalokra),
totpa mliokar la Orgahi-Orha'a, Uplerlawan maka gahani lyanit marna-nohkeran di, de o' edon mua'ala patke'a Kana'ana mniotni mak adiella letgarni riy id pa mhi'a la a'nu hawni.
Mere omlia' meman la a le'tu-ruhunu, me lu'wu-a'nu, totpa mua'ala patke'a id la a'nu Isaka.
Noma hopopanni de nakot la: “Matroma, yanhi'pa patke' de nahmena nlernohor a pua mai let di pa nhi'de agodia a'namu di pa uwal lia letmu-ruhunmu mak ha mliergot la?”
Mere Abrahama nakot la: “Yana! Yana muodia keke'en de pa muwal lia hande.
Uplerlawna mak kodi plolli la lyanti, mak kpolg a lia a'mu romni me lu'wu-a'nu letni, maka Nlokar pa Nala nnio'oni mai a'u emkadi: “Pena Agal noh dilla duratmu-waitmu.” Uplerlawan di hota ed maka khopna hopopanni-li'irnu nala' ul lia o'a totpa mua' nana patke'a id la la' hande pa mumehlima la a'nu.
Mere la'pa patke' de nahmen nor o' talla de o kwarmu la'a liokarmu mai a'u de nhorwua, hornama yan memmemna muodi a'nu pa mlia' hande.”
Noka hopopan de nlapar limni la matromni Abrahama lenanni onni na'nama nlokra-nhaut niohora hade.
Nhor nioka hopopan de na'ala matromni ontani termida, ne rla'awa pa rodia yohya'a samomuou harahu maka matromni nala. Emkadella nwaran pa nokru Aram-Mesopotamia, la'a Nahora letni.
La hande, dewade nhi' pa ontani re rrena la leta to'orni, la'a gera id onni, la'a lera lia'ani, la'pa patke'a re rlergot pa rla rtip gera.
Noma hopopan de nsumbaini niwra: “Orgahiya, Uplerlawnu ne! O' ed mak khi' Uplerlawna la matro'mu Abrahama, Mhi' totpena ler di de aliernana a maimia'yu di onni-matni. Mtiutu ralam kalwiedmu la matro'mu Abrahama.
La' handi de a'g e tiutrier lia gera matni onni, ne hararar mak kdella let di rlergot pa rma rtip gera.
Mhi' pa nla nlol emkadi de, hararar meni mak a'ukot la giwra: “Mpuatir kuku' nana kekanmu pa totpa agemun la”, noma nwahla: “Muemun la, ne ontamu re mana agalla remun wali,” hade ed maka Mtiutmuata-mkiewra' nana pa rala la hopopanmu Isaka. La'pa emkade de agat niohora de Omtiutg oleka ralam kalwiedmu la matro'mu de.”
La'pa edon nahor mua'ta lirni dewade Ribka nmai de nakwar nana kekanni. Noka Ribka nla ntip ger pa nahar la kekanni, na'nama nafia'at pa nmai owa'ana. Mere Ribka di, Betuela a'nani. Betuel di, Milka nor Nahor a'nani muanke'a, ne Nahor de Abrahama hyalli. Patke' hararar de samounu ne, hararara molanni.
<range>
Nmai nioka hopopanni plet pa la nwatroma pa nakot la: “Ine, mtiulan pa muala ger mak kden la kekan de oke' pa agemnia.”
Nwahla: “Muemun la, tuna.” Noma pleta-plet pa nalernia kekanni della limni wawannu na'nama nala nemnia.
La'pa nala hopopan de nemun pa nhorwua dewade nakot la: “Nhi'pa atip wuali ger la ontamu re remnia totpa honona re tiernu pe'era.”
Nhor nioka pleta-plet pa nhuria ger mak kdella kekanni de la'a yemun geni, noka nawlari owa'an pa nokru ger de pa ntip gera, ntip lia hopopan de ontani honona.
Ne hopopan de namolmuolga pa nlina-nmata patke' de, totpa namkeka nana de Orgahi Nhi'a yala'ani pa na'eni me edonna.
La'pa onta re remun pa tiernu rpe'er wa dewade hopopan de na'ala krap muaha ida maka rnairi la'a irannu, de weratni syikal id rehennu, me lel miaha tnialli id de weratni syikal termida,
noma natiana: “Ina, he' a'nani o'a? La' ammu romni de geni erla pa amanin ami?”
Noka nwahla niwra: “Nara, a'mu de Betuela, Milka nora Nahora a'nani.
Wewan kerna harahu etla am die la' pa onta ra'ana me ranin la wawannu. Geni pa mininmi mana erla.”
Noka hopopan de nwaltiora-nwaltieman me na'uli-nawedia Orgahi-Orha'a,
niwra: “Matroma! U'uli-uwedi O'a, mak khi' Uplerlawna la matro'mu Abrahama, O' maka Mual owa'an la nhol kalwiedwedni la'a matro'mu de, ne mak kodi olek a lia talan mak kokru matro'mu inni-narni amni-hyalli romni di.”
Nhor nioka hararar de nawlar pia nla nwahaur nohora hopopan della inni romni mniotni.
Ribka narni ida nwawa Labana. La'pa Laban namkek nana krapu la narni irannu me leli re la'a limni, ne natlin nana narni nwahaur nohora hya' maka hopopan de nakot la, noma Laban nawlari got pa nla nwatroma hopopan de, la'a gera wawannu. La'pa nlernana hopopan de e ntutrier mia'ta la onta-ontani re onni, la'a gera onni,
<range>
noma niwra: “Mmuai hyalia, o' maka Orgahi Nala ra'ani-pallu, nihya'pa omtiutrier lia tio'ora? Awuahi' targ oleka roma tiy o'owa, me geni la onta-ontamu ri.”
Hopopan de nla'awa Laban romni nayanni. Ralernia onta-ontani re wniowni me hya' maka rodia, ne rala wewan kerna rwa'ana onta-onta rena me rala gera pa hopopan de nora riy mak kor rewre'wa talla re ralla rohma doini lakni kdeheni.
Mere la'pa rhoiya yamanna la gaini ralamni, dewade hopopan de niwra: “Pap miy re, a'g edonna ukot ma'ta a yala'u onni, de a'g edon u'un ma'ta.” Laban nwahla: “Demade mukota hyalia.”
Noka niwra: “A' di, de Abrahama hopopanni a'u.
Orgahi Nala ra'ani-pallu la matro'mu de pa nre'a-ntaru. Nara'a-napalga de, Nala nhiuri-wnia'ana, leli-maha, ata-wa'ara patke'a rora muanke'a.
Ne Sara, matro'mu de hawni, la'pa nhape'ewa na'nama na'a'na nana muanke'a ida. Matro'mu de natemna re'eni-tniarnu re honona la a'nani de limni ralamni.
Matro'mu de na' olek la a liokru: “Yana mua'ala patke'a id la a'nu hawni la'a patke'a Kana'ana, maka aghol lia letni di,
mere mlia'awa a'mu romni me lu'wu-a'nu pa mua'ala patke'a id pa mumehlima la a'nu.”
Mere awuahla giwra: “Yanhi'pa patke' de nahmen nor a' tialla pa ammai la handi?”
Mere lirni mai a'u die: “Orgahi maka amuor lia gaini ralamni, pena Nhopna hopopanni-lili'irnu pa ror o' talla, ne pena rhi'a yalolmu-yala'amu pa nawulu-nawe'ela, nhi'nande pena omua' nana patke'a id la a'nu hawni la'a lu'wu-a'nu me a'mu romni ralamni.
Mere la'pa omlia'awa la lu'wu-a'nu de ne mak kdella a'mu romni rahmena rala patke'a id tiy o'a, de omuaul doinia liokarmu de mai a'u.”
Pede alia'awa. Ler di na'nama amuai pa tie' tar lia ger di matni, noka asiumbaini giwra: “Orgahi-Orha'a, maka khi' Uplerlawna la matro'mu Abrahama, Mpuayow nohor de Muala wulu-we'el la yalola-yala' mak a'ulohor nan di.
Mai handi pa atiutrier lia ger di matni onni. Wuakwak de la nlol emkadi, de hararara ida nlergot pa nma ntip gera, ne a'ukot la giwra: “Mtiulan pa muala ger no' kekanmu de oke' pa agemnu”,
ne nwahla niwra: “Muemun la, ne pena atip wal ger la onta-ontamu remnia, emkade pa O'a Mtiutga patke'a id pa nla'a matro'mu a'nani hawni.”
A li'ru la' ralmu edonna nhor mua'ta, dewade Ribka nmai pia nakwar nana kekanni, noma nla ntip gera. Li'ru la: “Mtiulan pa mual pa agemnu.”
Pleta-plet pa nalernu kekanni della wawayanni, noma lirni: “Muemun la, ne onta-ontamu re mana pena agalla remun wali.” Noka agemnu, me onta-onta re mana nalla remun wali.
Nhor nioka a'utiana giwra: “He' a'nani o'a?” Wniahlani: “A'mu Betuel, Nahor a'nani, mak Milka na'a'na nana.” Noma akenia krapu la irannu me leli re la limni.
Nhor nioka aguh idma-riama lia'ar pa u'uli-uwedia Orgahi-Orha'a mak khi' Uplerlawna la matro'mu Abrahama, mak kodi a lia talla plollola pa ga'ala matro'mu hyalli upni pat di pa gala la a'nani.
Pede dodo'ondi, la'pa ralam kalwiedmi me wnia'ama-wniahyalmi la matro'mu de pa muala patke' di, de mikot memna mai a'u. Ne la'pa edonan mana mikot memna mai a'u, totpa hota awuaror nohora hya'a maka aghi' dina.”
Noka Laban nora Betuel rwahla: “Hari honona de nwatiawua Orgahi-Orha'a. Ami edon mak kot nohora plolli-halli.
Mumkek la, hya' mak etla gaimu ralamni de, muodia pa mlia'awa, totpa nhi' haw la matrommu a'nani, emolmolan maka Orgahi-Orha'a Nakot targ oleka.”
La'pa Abrahama hopopanni de natlin nana hare lirni-tunnu, dewade nuh' idma-nrama lia'ar la Orgahi-Orha'a.
Nhi'noka hopopan de nalgota leli-maha, me naniairia noma nal hare honona la Ribka. Nal walia limtutu-limho'a mak welli werta la Ribka narni me inni.
Nakot momuoga yala'ani onni pa nhorwua dewade, nor talanwalli re ra'ana-remnu, noka ranin la hande wa. Repardoin yawyawra pa ramatgot wa dewade hopopan de niwra: “Miolin doin a lia pa uwal lia matro'mu.”
Mere Ribka narni me inni riwra: “Mualtarga hararar di pa amora mparin niana lera termid owa'ana, nhor niampena muora mlia'awa.”
Mere hopopan de nwahla re: “Yana mineti a'u, yoma Orgahi Nhi' oleka yalo'lu-yala'u pa nawulu-nawe'ela. Miolli a lia, totpa a'uwal lia matro'mu.”
Ribka narni me inni riwra: “Samounu de tpolu pleinia hararar de pa tatian nohora ralma-riorni.”
Noka rpol Ribka pa rakot la: “Ompuayow pa muora riy di talan pa mlia'awa?” Nwahla niwra: “Wuayowa.”
Noma rollia Ribka nora in mak katiak e'a, me Abrahama hopopanni de nora talanwalli rpa rla'awa.
Noma rwaka pa Orgahi-Orha'a Nara'a-napalga Ribka. Lirni rla: “Nara, ampakwak de ompueha-mliawan pa riwnu-riwnu, ne mpakwak de duratmu-waitmu rodi plolli la arwalli re letni-ruhunni.”
Noma Ribka nora hopopanni-lili'irnu patke'a re rwahi'a-rwayod wia, noka rha'at la ontani re pa rlernohora hopopan de. Emkadella hopopan de nodia Ribka pa rawal wia.
Lera ida ne Isaka nmai olek pa ntawua gera nwawa Lahai-Roi. Yoma ndella Negep lowanni.
Lera ida de lera nhi'pa nheria wa noma Isaka nlergot pa nalala'a la wewna wawannu pa nwarora-nwalai. Nwatul gaini pa namkek de onta-onta e rmai nieka.
Ribka mana nwatul gaini pa la'pa namkek nana Isak wa, dewade nerun la onta wawannu.
Nakot la hopopan de: “He' ed muanke' mak kala'a la wewna wawannu pa kharan rer it dina?” Hopopan de nwahla niwra: “Matro'mu eda de.” Noka Ribka nahew gaini (emolmolan neka patke'a mak kekeneka rmehlima nhi'inde rhi'a).
Nhor nioka hopopan de nwahaur nohora honona maka nhi' nana oleka la Isaka.
Noka Isaka nodia Ribka pa rla'awa inni hoiwialli, ne nora rmehlima. Isaka ralamni nal memna, ne ralamni mana namtierun wa, nhoratdoini inni matmiatni.
Lera ida ne Abrahama nmehlima owa'ana patke'a ida de nanni Ketura.
Patke' de a'na yanulu de Simran, mak klernohora Simran de, Yoksan, mak klernohora Yoksan, Medan, mak klernohora Medan de, Midian, mak klernohora Midian, Isybak, mak klernohora Isybak de, Suah. Gari hoho'a hade.
Noka Ketura a'nani Yoksana nlawlawan lol pa na'a'na nana a'na yanulu rala pa nwawa Syeba, mak klernohora Syeba de, Dedan. Dedan di duratni-waitni de makden Asyura, makden Letusyi, ne makden Leuma.
Ketura a'nani nwawa Midian de, a'nani yanulu de Efa, mak klernohora Efa, de Efer, mak klernohora Efer, Henok, mak klernohora Henok, Abida, mak klernohora Abida, Elda'a. Gari hoho'a hade. Hare honona rde Abrahama nora Ketura duratni-waitni.
Mere Abrahama nala re'eni-tniarnu honona rla Isaka.
Mere Abrahama nmormior mia'ta de nal to'a limtutnu-limho'oni la Ketura a'nani me a'nani maka Abraham nlernana la hawa liahunu, ne nhopna rhoitio'or la a'nani Isaka, ne rwaran pa rla'awa la' lowan la walli tipru.
Abrahama mormiorni nla' nana anni rahu ida terampwo'itu wehrani wolima.
Noka nmat wia. Nmat lia, mto'oni-pe'eni, la'a mormiorni de ralamni penpuenu-tetema, noma rawok wutga la upni-tgarni.
Noka a'nani re, Ismaila nora Isaka rkenia la liena Makpela, la'a Sohar a'nani Efron nhyi'ini, nhyi' mak kdella Mamre walli tipru.
Nhyi' di, ed maka Abrahama nawel niana la Efron, makden Heta. La' hande de rtamin targa Abrahama nora hawni Sar la.
La'pa Abrahama nmat wia dewade Uplerlawna Nara'a-napalga Isaka, ne Isaka nhol lia gera mak kwawa Ber Lahai-Roi.
Hadi de Ismaila, Abrahama a'nani, mak Hagara pat Mesira, Sara atni na'a'na nan de, duratni-waitni.
Hari de Ismaila a'nani nanni. Ismaila a'nani yanulu de, Nebayot, mak klernohora Nebayot, de Kedara, mak klernohora Kedara, Adbeel, mak klernohora Adbeel de, Mibsama,
mak klernohora Mibsama, Misyma, mak klernohora Misyma, Duma, mak klernohora Duma, Masa,
mak klernohora Masa, de Hadada, mak klernohora Hadada, Tema, mak klernohora Tema, Yetura, mak klernohora Yetura, Nafisyi, mak klernohora Nafisyi, Kedma. Gari hoho'a hade.
Hare de rlawan pa rwal lia ray termida wehrani woru. Rima-rima rora duratni-waitni, letni-ruhunni, likatni-larni.
Ismaila mormiorni de anni rahu ida terampwotelu wehrani wo'itu. Nhor nioka nmat wia. Nmat wia noka rawok wutga la upni-tgarni.
Ismaila duratni-waitni ri rhol lia nohanna-taniarta nden nek la leta Hawila pa nodi liarni la Syura, mak kdella Mesir walli tipru pa nokru Asyur lowanni. Mere nhi'inde rora inni-amni amni-hyalli rawenna.
Hadi de Abrahama a'nani Isaka duratni-waitni tuini-wedni.
Isaka aninni terampwogata, lerni la maka nor Ribka rmehlima. Ribka di narni nwawa Labana, ne amni nwawa Betuel. Betuel di, makdena Arama nwatiawua Padan Aram.
Isaka nsumbain la Orgahi, yoma hawni de nakleha a'na. Orgahi Nreiniana polpuollu-wakwakni, nhi'nande hawni Ribka na'apun wa.
Mere apannu mniotni rwayotli pede niwra: “A su'ku tia'ala pa a apnu ralamni emkadi. Nihya'pa emkadina?” Noka nwaka rorora-laliai la Orgahi niwra: “Matromlawnu ne! Nihya'pa apnu mniotni rwayotli?”
Orgahi lirni la: “Papay worga erla apanmu de ralamni, ne hota gari nadurit pa narehia yanulu hairni, ne a'na yanulu hota natlin la a'na gari.”
La'pa lerni ntu'tu pa nmor wia, de ntor doinia a'nani de radio'a.
Rtor doinia yanulu de, wullu mermera emeka rala rain wulwulu la inonni tetema, nhi'nande rala pa nwawa Esau (nnia'eratni de, wulwulga).
Noka garni nlernohora, limni nte'la rer lia yanulu tikalli, nhi'nande rweta la Yakopa (nnia'eratni de, tikalli. Ha nnia'eratni dom de, pudi-akla.) La'a ler maka ha ra'a'na rde Isak umarnu anni terampwonema.
Noma keke'enku'a rora rlawlawan lol wa. Yanulu nhi'a mak khiti ahu-kler ahla, riy maka heparnu de ndella wo'ora-kawru, mere gari de riy id maka muli-mtie'ela, ne heparnu de ndella hoiwiali nayanni.
Isaka ralamni nala yanulu, yoma heparnu de na'ana hiti ahu-lier ahla eni, mere Ribka de ralamni nala gari.
Lera ida ne gari npipara wora mermera, noka yanulu nwatiawu wo'ora pa nmai die, de naplar memna.
Yanulu nakot la gari: “Ple'etu, muala pipar mermermu de oke' pa a'u'una, yoma a'uplar memna.” Emkade pede nanni de rweta la Edom (nnia'eratni de, mermera.)
Mere gari nakot la niwra: “Ompuayow de, it amni nmat wia de, omuala yodmu mai a'u.”
Yanulu niwra: “Yowa, pena agala. Yoma a'uplar memna, ne hota amuat die, a yo'du re rodia hya' unut mai a'u.”
Gari niwra: “Mliokra plein mai a'u puena!” Noka yanulu nlokar la Orgahi totpa gari na'ala yodni.
Noka gari nala roti me wora della yanulu, nhor nioka na'ana-nemun pa nhorwua dewade naprir pia nla'awa. Emkadella, yanulu edon nwarei-nwadan nohora yodni de.
Noma rehka-lara nwewar la gen de. Mere hadi de rehka-lara Abraham lerni atia'a. Rehka-lar di nhi'nande Isaka nla'awa Gerar makden Filistin rayni geni, la'a Abimelek Filistin rayni.
Noma Orgahi Ntutga rupni la, pa Nakot la: “Isaka! Yana mlia'awa Mesira, mere mhuol lia gen meni maka pena A'ukota tiy o'a.
Mdiella gen di emeka do'ona-dakna, pena Ago'ru talla, ne A'ura'a-upa'lu, yoma Agala gen di tiy o'a me duratmu-waitmu, ne hota A'ugeni a liokru maka Aget tiarga la ammu Abrahama.
Pena Aghi'a duratmu-waitmu pa emolmolla wtion mak kdena lyanti, totpa Agala noha-rai di tetema la duratmu-waitmu, ne onnila duratmu-waitmu, nhi'nande rimormior nohkeran di rlernana ra'a-palu.
Hari honona hota ntutu-nte'ewa onnila Abrahama natlina-natailla A li'ru, ne nlernohora nhiopnu-li'iru, nnie'eru-tniatru me deulu-tatru tetema.”
Pede Isaka nhol lia Gerar.
Noka makden hande ramkek de hawni samoga nhi'nande ratian nohora la Isaka, noma nakot nohora hawni niwra hade de e narni, yoma namta'ata nakota niwra hade de e hawni, yoma wniarorni: “Yanhi'pa let di mniotni rwenan nan a'u, onnila Ribka tototni-rerieini, yoma patke' de irnu hlioi-mat lawruru.”
Ndella hande pa lardoinia wenu-wolla, me'eta-anni dom la, noma lera ida ne Filistin rayni Abimeleka namkek lola folla de Isak nora hawni Ribka rwamuri-rwale'era!
Noka Abimelek npolga Isaka pa nakot la: “Plollolli de hade de hapmu hade, mere mukot oleka miwra: Hade de o narmu.” Isaka nwahla niwra: “A'ukot emkade yoma wniaro'ru: Yanhi'pa natota-nariei pia nhi'nande rwen a'u.”
Mere Abimelek niwra: “Hya'a nhiol miaka omhi' nan oleka mai am dina? Emkameni la'pa riy id la makden gen di nora hapmu ranin wutu, nhi'nande pena ha natota-nariei pia omuodi am lia do'a-hala ralamni.”
Noma Abimelek nala titni-kaini la limni-rorni honona, niwra: “He' maka nhi' yatyat la riy di nor hawni de hota rwenan toto'a.”
Noka Isaka nawuli-natniamin la lowna-ahla no' hande. La'a anin de neka, pa nlernana wullu-we'elli rahu id ralamni, yoma Orgahi Nala ra'ani-pallu la.
Pare'a-patniarga, ne la'pa re'eni-tniarnu nlawlawan lol to'owa pa ler la pripanni-fa'anni.
Ntarga nhiuri-wnia'ana, me hopopanni-lili'irnu liawanni, nreiniande makdena Filistin re ra'andoin gahani rla.
Hade pede gera honona re maka amni hopopanni-lili'irnu rah niana la amni Abrahama lerni, makden Filistin re rnakduran momuou ral tani.
Noma Abimelek nakot la Isaka: “Mpuaran pa mlia'awa meni-meni pa mtio'or doini am lia, yoma omurehi olek la re'emu-tniarmu. O limmu-rormu nek de harahu wali.”
Pede Isaka nwaran la hande wa pa nhor nioka nkeni krahanni la Gerar mtatanni, noka nhol lia hande wa.
Nhi'noka Isaka nahi owa'ana ger maka rah niana la amni Abrahama lerni maka Filistina mniotni rnakdurn oleka la lera Abrahama nmat wia de, rnairi owa'ana gera re nanni, rlernohora nan maka amni nala re.
La'pa Isaka hopopanni-lili'irnu rahai lia lowan de, de rlernana gera matni nopli-nopli.
Noma Gerar mniotni mak kodi pipi-duma re rora Isaka limni-rorni mak kod pipi-duma re rawo'ora, riwra: “Ger di de a han mamni.” Noka Isaka nweta ger della Esek (nnia'eratni de, rawo'or nohora), yoma hare ror e rawo'or la hande.
Nhi'noka rahi owa'ana gera id owa'ana, mere rahankeran pa rawo'or wali. Noma Isaka nweta ger della Sitna (nnia'eratni de, rahankeran reri).
Rwaran la hande noka rahi ger id owa'ana, mere la'a ger di wawannu de edonna rawo'ora. Nala ger di pa nwawa Rehobot (nnia'eratni de, geni hgal liawna), ne niwra: “Dodo'ondi Orgahi Nal oleka geni ghal liawan di mai it pa totpa ta'upa-ta'a'na la gen di.”
Ndella hande pa nla'awa Bersyeba.
Nmel wa noma Orgahi Ntutga rupni la Isaka, me niwra: “Isaka! A' di de Uplerlawna la ammu Abrahama. Yan mumta'ata, yoma Agor o' talla. Pena Agala ra'u-pa'lu tio'a, upe'era-ulawna duratmu-waitmu onnila Abrahama mak klernohora A'u.”
Nhor nioka Isaka nariria katri'ana id la hande, ne na'uli-nawedia Uplerlawna-Mempulwatnu, nkeni krahanni la hande, ne hopopanni-lili'irnu re mana rahi ger la hande.
Lera ida ne Abimeleka nwatiawua Gerar pa nma nwatroma, nor rewre'wa kniarwialli Ahusat (mak kano'a-ka'atg e'a), me nor walia mak kodi keki-rautu o'tani Pikhol.
Mere Isaka nakot la re: “Nihya'pa mia mpiatrom a'u? La ler mak itto'or la de, ralammi ramehra mai a'u pa mhiopan pa aliergot la genmi de.”
Rwahla riwra: “Ameh'a mat niohora de Orgahi Nor o' talla pede amiwra: Samounu de itla' wutu liokra ida pa itsi' nnio'a ida totpa it idma nhi' samomuou ida.
Lerni pa mdiella Gerar de ami edon mhi' yatyatni la miy mere amhi' pa mdiella mtiertierannu la'pa ntutu-nte' meman la ler maka ampak pa mliergot la a gen mamni, pede mpak pa miy mhi' emkade wali mai ami. Yoma amatga de Uplerlawna Nal oleka ra'ani-pallu tiy o'a.”
Nhor nioka Isaka nhi'a ya'anlawna-yemunlawna re, noma ra'ana me remun wa.
Repardoin yawyawar ma'ta de rhi'a liokar wutu-nhiaut wutu. Nhor nioka Isaka nolin doinia rpa rla'awa, ne Isak mana nwarin liola kalwiedni-paitiotni mtiertierannu.
Ler de, de Isaka hopopanni-lili'irnu rma rwe'er nohora ger maka ha rahi oleka wa, pa rakot la riwra: “Amlernan olek gera wa.”
Noma Isak nweta ger della Syeba (nnia'eratni de, liokra). Nhi'nande let de nanni Bersyeba, nodia pa dodo'ondi.
La'pa Esau umarnu anni terampwogat wa dewade na'ala Yudita, Beeri makden Heta a'nani, me Basmata, Elon makden Heta a'nani pa nhi'a la hawni rora.
Patke'a rora rodia ihru mehra-ralam pahna la Isak nora Ribka.
La'pa Isaka nhamto'owa pa matni npon wa, dewade npolga a'nani yanulu Esau pa nakot la: “Ama!” Esau nwahla niwra: “Ee, papa!”
Isaka naltier lia niwra: “Omuat niohora de aghamto' olekwa, nhi'nande hota a'uplin niohora a matmia'tu onni la' ler meni.
Hade pede la' ler di de, mua'ala ra'pa, la muhak nana porni-dawarni la'a wewna wawannu pa
mpuatunu-mpuatah'a la mikmikarni-lamliamanni emeka a ralmu nwakwaka totpena la'pa a'g edonna muat mia'ta de agala ra'a-pal tiy o'a.”
La'pa Isaka naltier lia a'nani Esau, de Ribka natlin reria. Ne la'pa Esau nla'awa wo'or pa nhokra porni-dawarni ida totpa nodia la amni, de
Ribka npolga a'nani: “Yakopa mmuai! A'utlin nan ammu e na'ohma hyalmu Esau ha nlolola.
E na'ohma pa la nahaka pip piora-waw diawra mai pia rwatunu-rwatah'a pa ammu na'ana totpena nala ra'a-palu, re'a-tniaru, geni-tiena mak kwatiawua Orgahi-Orha'a, yoma namta'at yanpa hota edon nalo'on wali ne nmati.
Pede dodo'ondi de, mutlina-mutailla li'ru mak aghopan targa tiy o'a.
Mlia'awa it genni mak it pipni-dumni rawok tar lia, ne mua'ala pipi a'na samomuou woru, pa atiunu-niahaga la mikmikarni-lamliamanni, emeka ha ralamni nwakwaka.
Muodia la ammu pa na'ana, totpena la'pa edonna nmat mia'ta de nara'a-napa'lu.”
Noka gari nakot la inni Ribka: “Mere ka'ku, de riy wulwulga, mere a' di de ulti namdiddidni.
Yanhi'pa la'pa nteman nan a'u nwarora de aghi' pudi-akla. La'pa emkade de a'g edonna liernana ra'a-palu, mere liernana hoptutu-hoplera.”
Mere inni nakot la niwra: “A'g ed mak kakwara hoptutu-hopler de ama. Mutlina-mutailla a li'ru, mlia la'pa mua'ala pipi a'na maroro'a re pa muodi muai pia awuahi'a-wuayodia pa mikmikri-lamliamni.”
Noka gari nlernohora.
Nhor nioka Ribka na'ala Esau naniayarni mak samomuou muemna, maka namoin taru re la roma nayanni, noka nhopna Yakopa nnairia.
Ne pipi a'na de ulatni, de na'ala pa newan wutga la limni rora me tiernu la' geni mak kamdiddidin de.
Noka nala yamanna mikmikri-lamliamni me rot miaka ha nwatah' oleka de pa nala Yakopa.
Emkadella gari nla'awa amni genni, noka nakot la niwra: “Ama!” Amni nwahla niwra: “Ee! He' o' e?”
Nwahla: “Esau a'u. Awuahi'a-wuayodi oleka maka ompuakwaka. Mumat pa ma mu'una totpena nhor die mura'a-mupalg a'u.”
Noka Isaka nakot la Yakopa: “To'a, o fiekatmu?” Nwahla niwra: “Yoma Orgahi-Orha'a, Uplerlawanmu de, Nhi' a' pua aliernana awuahakaka.”
Noka Isaka nakot la: “Mua mriehgoru ama, totpena atieman la inonmu, toto' pa o' di de Esau me edonna.”
Noka gari nrehgoru amni, noma amni nteman la inonni, noma niwra: “La'a lirmu di Yakopa lirni, mere limmu di Esau limni.”
Nhi'nande Isaka edonna nat niohora, yoma limni wulwulga emolmolla a'nani Esau limni. Mere Isaka nwahi' pa nara'a-napalga.
Mere natian ma'ta: “Plola pa o' di de a'nu Esau o'a?” Nwahla niwra: “Yowa!”
Noka Isak nakot la niwra: “Muala yamanan de pa rehgoru, totpa a'u'una ha anna hiti ahu-lier ahla enmu, totpena agala ra'a-pal tiy o'a.” Noma nala yamanna rpa rehgorgoru amni, noka na'ana. Nod walia anggur pa nemun walia.
Noka Isak nakot la niwra: “Mua mriehgorgoru, pa mkinni a' wua ama.”
Noka Yakopa nma nrehgorgoru na'nama nkinnia amni. La'pa Isaka na'irun nana naniayarni huwnu, dewade nwaka Uplerlawna pa Nara'a-napalga Yakop niwra: “Plollola la a'nu huwnu emolmolla wo'ora-kawru maka Orgahi Nara'a-napalu huwnu.
Orgahi-Orha'a Uplerlawna-Mempulwatnu, awuaka pa ler di lyanit marna ntowria otanni, nohkerna-rai miarna nmoria wullu-we'elli pripanni-fa'anni.
Awuak pa hairi-hairi pena ratlina-ratailla a'nu, ne mak kdella noha-rai re hota rwaltior la nayanni. Nla'a upa-matrom la amni-hyalli, ne inni a'nani re hota ratlina-ratailla e'a, he' ed mak kala hoptutu-hopler la' e' de, de O'a Mhuoptutu-mhuoplera, ne he' mak kala ra'a-pal la' e' de, de O'a hota Mura'a-mupalga.”
La'pa Isaka nala ra'a-palu pa nhorwua, ne na'nama a'nani gari nlergot pa naltarga amni, dewade Esau nmai pia nodia hiti ahu-lier ahla enni.
E' mana npipar walia ha'anna hiti ahu-lier ahla enni maka mikmikarni-lamliamanni, noka nodia la amni. Nakot la amni: “Ama, mumat pa mu'una ha'anna hiti ahu-lier ahla enni, totpa mura'a-mupalg a'u.”
Mere amni niwra: “He' ed o' dina de?” Nwahla niwra: “A' di de a'namu yanulu Esau.”
Dewade amni nheduma, noka nakot la niwra: “He' ed mak khokar nana porni-dawarni de pa nodi oleka mai a'u wua? La'pa edonna mmuai mia'ta de a'un doini oleka, ne a'ura'a-upalg oleka wa, ne riy maka a'ura'a-upalga oleka de, hade ed maka klernana ra'a-palu.”
La'pa Esau natlin nana amni lirni di, dewade napolu-natnian mieman la ralam mehrani ralamni, noka nakot la amni: “Ama, mura'a-mupal wali a'u mue!”
Amni nwahla: “Garmu nma nodi oleka pudi-akla, pa nlernan oleka ra'amu-palmu de.”
Mere Esau nwahla niwra: “Inee! Nanni de naplol pa rweta la Yakopa (nnia'eratni de, pudi-akla), yoma nalahar nana olek a'u re'eni woru. A yo'du nte'la nan oleka wa, ne dodo'ondi, de nte'la nan owa'ana yara'u-yapa'lu wali. Ama, mukleha yara'a-yapalu dom to' mai a'u?”
Noka amni nakot la: “Plollolli de arian oleka garmu pa nla'a matrom la o wawanmu, ne amni hyalli-inni narni honona re agala pa rla'a ata-wa'ar la, ne agal oleka pa hota nlernana metma nora anggur turnu narehi-nalawna. Noma hota hya' ma'ta etla pa agala tiy o'a a'nu ne?”
Nwahla: “Toto' pa ra'a-pal die ida nmemeh'a taru? Muala ra'a-pal mai a'u ama!” Dewade Esau lirni naprahka la kniakru.
Noka amni nakot la niwra: “Plollolli de nhiol genmu hota olieta-patoga la nohanna-taniarat mak kawuli-kawe'el la noh di wawannu, ne geni miaka lyanit marna ntowria otanni mana olieta-patoga.
Hota muor lia wehlamu wawannu pa mu'ara, ne omlia' ata-wa'ar la garmu. Mere hota omurur matmiat pia muaul doinia kwar dilla wawayanmu.”
Esau natatahana ralam mehrani la garni Yakopa, onnila ra'a-pal muaka amni nal oleka la, noma nakot la ralamni: “Lera-mela yaluli-yahon nohora a'mu matmiatni edon nalo'on wa. Ler yaluli-yahon nohora nhor niampena awuenna ga'ru.”
La'pa rwahaur nohora Esau lirni la inni Ribka, dewade nhopan pa rpolga a'nani gari, na'nama nakot la: “Hyalmu yanulu nwaror pa nwen o'a pa na natepra hankeranni (ralam mehrani).
Pede dodo'ondi, mutlina-mutailla a li'ru ama, mpuahi'a-mpuayod pia muwlar pia mlia'awa yeimu Laban, la' Harana,
ne muora mhiol wut lia hande pa me'eta-anni naya'ida-nayaworu, la'pa hyalmu yanulu ahankeranni me
ralmha'arni namdiar wua, ne nhoratdoini-nehla doini hya' maka omhi' nana nhi'nanpena aghopna riy rtiy ra'lu la hande. Inee! Yanpa idma nwunu-nwen id la a ga'yu ralamni.”
Hade pede Ribka nakot la Isaka: “A ralmu edon nala patke'a Heta re. La'pa Yakopa na' nana patke' Heta id mak kden gen di pa nora rmehlima, de samounu di amuat niek wa!”
Ribka lirni nrei pia Isaka npolga a'nani gari pa nano'a niwra: “Ama, memieheni me, yana mua'ala patke'a Kana'ana pa mhi'a la hapmu.
Mere mlia'awa Padan Aram la'a upmu Betuela romni, ne mua'ala yeimu Laban a'nani id la hande pa muora mmiehlima.”
Nano'a pa nhor nia'nama nara'a-napalga pa niwra: “Awuakwak de Uplerlawna mak kodi plolli-ktaryatnu pena Nara'a-napa'lu, Nhi'u pa mu'upa-mu'a'na, mpueha-mliawna, totpa rawal lia hairi ida prirni.
Awuakwak de Uplerlawna Nala Abrahama ra'ani-pallu tiy omuora duratmu-waitmu, nhi'nande mliernana gen di pa gahamu, gen miaka miy mhiol lia emeka do'ona-dakna maka Uplerlawna Nal oleka la Abrahama.”
Emkadella pa Isaka nolin doinia Yakopa, noka Yakopa nwaran pa nla'awa Padan Aram, nla'a yeini Laban romni. Laban di, Betuel makden Aram de a'nani. Laban narni de Ribka. Ribka a'nani de, Esau nor Yakopa.
La'pa Esau nat niohora amni nano'a garni pa yana na'ala pat Kana'ana pa nhi'a la hawni, noma amni nara'a-napalga garni, nhor nia'nama garni nla'awa Padan Arama totpa na'ala patke'a id la hande pa nhi'a la hawni, nlernohora inni-amni lirni,
<range>
nhi'nande Esau natga de amni ralamni edon nala patke'a Kana'ana re.
Hade pede nla'awa yeini Ismail, noka na'ala Ismail a'nani Mahalat pa nhi'a la hawni, na'itar wutu hawni rora. Ismail di de Abrahama a'nani, noka Ismaila na'a'na nana Nebayot nora garni Mahalat.
Noma emkade pa Yakopa nwaran la Bersyeba pa nla'awa Haran.
La la'pa ntut tiar lia geni id la, yoma lera mana la nmel wa. Na'ala watu id la hande pa nhi'a la klunu, noka nanina la gen die.
Noma nmi'a. La mi'ini ralamni de, la'a noha wawannu de retna ida ntutrieri, wuwannu nla'gennia Ilyamou-Watyatoha, ne namkek nana Orgahi hopopanni-lili'irnu rernu-rha'at la retan de!
Orgahi Ntutrier lia retan de walli heyanna! Na'nama Nakot la: “Yakopa! A' di de Orgahi-Orha'a, mak kla' Uplerlawna la upmu-tgarmu Abrahama me la'a ammu Isaka. Ne gen miaka ha munin la di, de hota Agala tiy o'a, muora duratmu-waitmu.
Duratmu-waitmu emolmolla en liu'wu-tan miakmu, ne hota re'era-rhakra la tipru, ra'i, warta me tranna, ne onnila omuora duratmu-waitmu pa nohkerkeran di mniotni rlernana ra'a-palu.
Plollolli de Agor o' talla. Mlia' lol meni-meni de, Atiokreri-gheprie'ru, ne hota Ago'du pa muwal lia noh di, yoma A'g edon galtar o'a, mere Aghi'a hya'a-hya' maka A'uno'targa tiy o'a.”
La'pa Yakopa namat la yaninni, namta'at pa niwra: “Plollolli de Orgahi etla gen di, mere a'uplin niohora pa unin la. Gen di narehi-nalawan memna pa toto' meman pa Uplerlawna romni, Ilyamou-Watyatoha puohrani.”
<range>
Repardoin yawyawar ma'ta de Yakopa na'ala wat muaka ha naklun die, nariria pa nhi'a la lairiri, noka nhuria wu'ru la watu wawannu.
Yakopa nweta gen diella Betel (nnia'eratni de, Uplerlawna romni). Mere Yakopa edon nanin ma'ta la hande de, de let mak rehgorgoru gen die rweta pa nwawa Lus.
Noka Yakopa nlokra: “Orgahi-Orha'a Uplerlawna-Mempulwatnu. La'pa O' pena Mtiok reri-mhiep rier a lia talan mak aliolola, Muala rot pia u'una, ne naniair pa aniairia,
la'pa agodia kalwieda-paitiota uwal lia a'mu romni, de pena O' ed maka aghi'a la a Uplerlawnu.
Ne wat muaka upriria pa nla'a lairir di de pena nla'a geni miaka ra'uli-rawedi O' nanmu. La'a hare honona maka Omuala mai a'u rde agala nhiakra id la nhiakra termid ralamni (sepersepuluh) tiy O'a.”
Nhi'noka Yakopa nwaran la hande pa nokru noha Bani tipru.
Lera ida ne namkek nana gera id la wo'or letgarni, ne duma wokni wotelu ranin la onni, yoma la'a ger de wawannu de riy ralla dumni remnu. Ger de, tniutawnu de wat liawna ida.
Ne la'pa duma re wokni rheria la hande, demade mak kodi re rwaklol dioini wat diella ger de nurnu, demade ralla duma re remnu, nhor diemade rkeni owa'an wat diella ger de nurnu.
Noka Yakopa la' pa natiana la mak kodi re: “Ama-hyal miy re, miy mpatiawu meni?” Rwahla riwra: “Ampatiawua Haran.”
Natian owa'an la re: “Miy miat niohora Nahor upni Labana?” Rwahla riwra: “Yowa, amatga.”
Nhi'noka nakot la re: “Enkalwiedweda?” Rwahla riwra: “Nkalwiedweda. Mere mumkek la, Labana a'nani patke'a Rahela nmai niek di, nodia dumni.”
Noka Yakop niwra: “Hyal miy re, ler lawan ma'ta pa edon rawok ma'ta nhiuri-wnia'ana. Mialla dummu re remun pleini, nhor diemade mlia miodi owa'ana re.
Mere rwahla riwra: “La'pa nhiuri-wnia'ana re wokni-wokni edon rawok momuou ma'ta de, ami edonna mhi' nan hade. Nanpena rwaklol dioini wat diella gera nurnu, demade amalla dum mamni re remnu.
La'pa nor ma'ta re raltiertier rier de, Rahela nmai wia pia nodia amni dumni, yoma e' mak kodia re.
La'pa Yakopa namkek nana Rahela, yeini Laban a'nani, nor wut lia dumni, dewade nma nwakriania, noma nwaklol dioini watu la gera nurnu, na'nama nalla Rahela dumni re remnu.
Dewade Yakopa nkinnia narni Rahela pa nkakur wah'a lirni.
Noka Yakopa nwahaur nohor la Rahela, e' de de Rahela amni narni Ribka, a'nani. Noma Rahela nawlar pia nla nwahaur la amni.
La'pa Laban natlin nana Yakopa, narni a'nani, dewade nawlar pia nla nwatroma, nrehgorga pa nkolla na'nama nkinnia, nhor nioka nodia pa nla'awa romni nayanni. Noma Yakopa nwahaur nohora inni-amni mormiorni-dardiarni la Labana.
Laban nakot la: “Ame, plollolli de o' di de ihyida-rar id wut mai a'u.” Noma Yakopa nden wut lia pa nla' nana wolla id tututu.
Nhor nioka Laban nakot la Yakopa: “Hya' pa o' di de na'ru a'nani nekane hota omkiari momuou mai a'u. Mukot mai a'u hya' maka agala la prehenmu.”
Laban a'nani patke'a woru. Yanulu nanni Lea, ne gari nanni Rahela.
Lea matni edonna samoga, mere Rahel de inonni, gaini honona samounu di!
Hade pede Yakopa ralamni nala Rahela, reiniande niwra: “Ame, akar tiy o' pa anni wo'itu totpa aliernana Rahela, a'namu gar die pa aghi'a la ha'wu.
Laban nwahla: “Ame, wakwakmu di, a'g edon wuayotlia. Samounu di, omuora mmiehlima totpa yanpa nor riy doma rmehlima. Mdien wut mai a lia gen di.”
Pede Yakopa nkar niana anni wo'itu totpa nlernana Rahela, pa nhi' la hawni, mere anin mandiditu re nwarora de emekto'a lera wo'ira rmeh'a, onnila ralamni nal toto'a Rahela.
Nhor nioka Yakopa nakot la Labana: “Ame, awuak pa muala a pa'tu de mai a'u, totpa agora manin wutu yoma lera nnielu ntu'tu wa.”
Noka Laban npolg awoka mak kden hande honona rpa rhi'a ya'anlawna-yemunlawna.
Mere la'pa nmella, dewade na'ala a'nani Lea pa nla nala la Yakopa. Noma Yakopa nor Lea ranin wutu.
Laban mana nal wali atni patke'a Silpa la'a a'nani Lea pa nhi'a la atni.
Mere repardoin de namkek de maka nora ranin wutu de, Lea. Noka Yakopa la nakot la Laban: “Hya' maka omhi'a mai a'u dina?! Akar tiy o' de totpa aliernana Rahela. Nihya'pa omuakal nan a'u?!”
Laban nwahla: “Ame, riy edonna rhi' tar tiarga nhiol mak emkarella a gen miamni di, de ramehlima gari nala' ulu yanulu.
Mupenu pleinia lera wo'it lia muora a'nu di mehlimmi, nhor diemade a'nu handina mana agala tiy o' pa emeka prehenmu nhierannu, hornama mkiari mai a'u pua anni wo'itg owa'ana.”
Noma Yakopa nhi' emolmoll emkade, de napenga lera mandiditnu nora Lea mehlimni, nhor nioka Laban nal owa'an a'nani Rahel pa nhi'a la hawni.
Laban mana nal wali Bilha, atni patke'a la a'nani Rahela, totpa nhi'a la atni.
Noka Yakopa nor Rahel ranin wut wali. Mere rereh wiali ralamni nal memna Rahela, ematia'a Lea. Emkade nekpa nkari owa'an la Laban anni wo'itu.
La'pa Orgahi Namkek de Yakopa ralamni edon nala Lea, dewade Nhi'a Lea pa na'a'na, mere Rahel de nakleh a'na.
Lea na'apnu pa nmor niana muanke'a ida, nala nanni pa nwawa Rubena (nnia'eratni de, mumkeka, a'nu muanke'a hadi), yoma niwra: “Orgahi Ntolwiah'a-ntakarwah'a a meh'ru mai a'u. Plollolli la' ler di ha'wu hota ralamni nala a'u.”
Na'apun owa'ana pa nmor niana muanke'a ida, noka niwra: “Orgahi Natlin nana de, a ha'wu di, ralamni edon nal a'u, pede Nal owa'ana keke'en di mai a'u.” Noma nala keke'en de pa nwawa Simeona (nnia'eratni de, natlin nana).
Na'apun owa'ana pa nmor niana muanke'a ida, noka niwra: “Ralamni di, de ha'wu ralamni hota naknioholia mai a'u, yoma a'u'a'na nana muanke'a wotel lia.” Nhi'nande nala keke'en de pa nwawa Lewi (nnia'eratni de, ralamni nakniohu).
Na'apun owa'ana pa nmor niana muanke'a ida noma niwra: “Ralamni di de a'u'uli-uwedia Orgahi-Orha'a,” nhi'nande nala keke'en de pa nwawa Yehuda (nnia'eratni de, ra'uli-rawedia). Nhorwua dewade edon na'apun wa.
Rahela nwarora edon nlernana a'na, noka ralamni namehra doin la kakni, nhi'nande Rahela nakot la hawni Yakopa niwra: “Papa, mual a'na mai a'u. Er edonande amuati.”
Noka Yakopa ahankeranni-ralmha'arni la'a Rahela, noka natiana: “A' di de Uplerlawna wniaunu a'u, pa atieri-tia'wu pa edon mu'a'na?!”
Rahela niwra: “La'pa emkade de, mua'ala Bilha di, a'tu patke'a hadi, omuora minin wutu totpa na'a'na totpena onnila Bilha aliernana durti-waiti.”
Noma nala atni della Yakopa pa nhi'a la hawa liahunu. Noka Yakopa nora at de ranin wutu.
At de na'apnu pa na'a'na nana muanke'a id la Yakopa.
Rahela nakota la: “Uplerlawna Ntutg oleka de, a'g ed mak kaplola, yoma Natlina-nataili oleka a polpuo'lu-wakwa'ku, ne Nala muanke'a id mai a'u.” Hade pede nala keke'en de pa nwawa Dan (nnia'eratni de, nakota mak kaplola).
Rahela atni pat di, Bilha na'apun owa'ana, noka nmor niana muanke'a wornu la Yakopa.
Rahel nakot niwra: “Agora ka'ku mparehi matmiati, ne a'ulernia la yawa.” Noma nala keke'en de pa nwawa Naftali (nnia'eratni de, mparehi).
La'pa Lea namkek de e' edon na'a'na wal wia, dewade na'ala atni Silpa pa nala la Yakop pa nhi'a la hawa liahunu.
Noka Silpa, (Lea atni patke'a) na'a'na nana muanke'a id la Yakopa.
Lea niwra: “Yara'a-yapalu nmai wia.” Noma nala keke'en de pa nwawa Gad (nnia'eratni de, pripanni-fa'anni).
Ne Lea atni Silpa na'a'n owa'ana muanke'a wornu la'a Yakopa.
Lea niwra: “A' di de uhepru! Plollolli de patke'a hota riwra a' di de uhepuepru.” Noma nala keke'en de pa nwawa Asyer (nnia'eratni de, muki-hepru).
La'pa metma rieiki-wnio'ora lerni, pa Rubena nala'a la wo'ora, nlernana orwo'a-auwo'a Dudaima (maka ra'ana plet pa ra'apun wa) noka nodia pa nala la inni Lea. Mere Rahela nakot la Lea: “Ela, mtiulan pa mual nana orwo'a-auwo'a Dudaima mak a'namu nlernana re dom mai a'u.”
Mere Lea nwahla: “Mua' nana ha'wu de edonna ntu'tu ma'ta?! Dodo'ondi miwra mua' owa'ana orwo'a-auwo'a Dudaima mak a'nu de nodia?!” Rahel nakot la: “Ela, emkade de mel di de muora Yakop minina, totpa ralla rhernu orwo'a-auwo'a mak a'namu nodia re.”
La'pa lera nla'a, pa Yakopa nwatiawu wo'or pa nmai wia, dewade Lea nla' pa nwatroma noka nakot la: “Ee! Mai pia itanin la mel di, yoma plollolli de agal oleka orwo'a-auwo'a gala uweli o'a.” Reiniande Yakopa nora Lea ranin wut lia mel de.
Noka Uplerlawna Natlin la Lea polpuollu-wakwakni, Lea na'apnu pa nmor niana a'na muanke'a mak wolimni la Yakopa.
Noka Lea niwra: “Uplerlawna Nal oleka a prehenu nhierannu, yoma agal oleka a'tu patke'a la ha'wu.” Noma nala keke'en de pa nwawa Isakar (nnia'eratni de, prehenu nhierannu).
Nhor nioka Lea na'apun owa'ana pa nmor niana muanke'a mak wonemni la Yakopa.
Lea niwra: “Uplerlawna Nal oleka ra'a-pal samomuou mai a'u. Ralamni di de, ha'wu hota na'unni-namta'at a'u, yoma a'u'a'na nana a'na muanke'a wonem la.” Noma nala keke'enku' de pa nwawa Sebulon (nnia'eratni de, ra'unni-ramta'ata).
Nhor nioka na'a'n owa'ana patke'a ida, ne nal nanni pa nwawa Dina.
Noka Uplerlawna Nhorat reri Rahela pa Natlin la polpuollu-wakwakni noka Nhi'a Rahela pa na'apun wa.
Rahela na'apun pa nmor niana muanke'a ida. Niwra: “Uplerlawna Nhap doini oleka a molmola-mama'u.”
Noma nala keke'en de pa nwawa Yusupa (nnia'eratni de, awuak pa liernana owa'ana a'na ida) yoma niwra: “Wuakwak de Orgahi Na'itr owa'ana a'na muanke'a id mai a'u.”
La'pa Rahela nmor niana Yusup dewade Yakopa nakot la Laban: “Ama, mhur dioini a lia pa uwal lia le'tu-ruhunu maka rteti a horu-rki'ira a kliawtu.
Muala ha'wu-a'nu re mak kla'a a prehenu nhierannu totpa amla'awa, yoma la'a me'eta-anin maka akari oleka tiy o'a.”
Mere Laban nakot la niwra: “La'pa aliernana ralam kalwiedmu de, omdien nek la handi. A'umkek olek la ihriehera de Orgahi Nala ra'a-pal mai a'u onnila o'a.
Muetlia prehenmu maka apuairia tiy o'a, totpena agala.”
Yakopa nwahla niwra: “Omueh'a muat niohora de emkamenila a knia'ru tiy o'a, ne emkameni la nhiurmu-wnia'anmu la'a li'mu ralamni,
yoma re'emu-tniarmu edon harahu plollola, la'a ler maka amuai tiy o'a, mere dodo'ondi de rpeha-rlawna toto'a, ne Orgahi Nala ra'ani-pallu tiy o'a la'a lera-ler mak adiella handi, pede hota mowen nianpena akar lia ha'wu-a'nu re tiernu-apannu?”
Laban niwra: “Hya' mak agala tiy o'a, Ame?” Yakopa nwahla: “Yana mual neka hya'-hya'a mai a'u, agiwra godi owa'ana pipmu-dummu, ne utiaka re, hornama omhur niohora hadi mai a'u.
Ler di hota aliola pipmu-dummu re letgarni, ne awuakei dioinia pipi me duma mak roriou-ponpona hongonu-laklaka, me dum a'na memetma, honona rde muala la a prehenu.
Ne plo'lu-mneh'u pena ralharia la ler li'iru, ler meni pa mua mtioli-mtiakar la a prehenu. La'pa pipi-duma mak edonna roriou-ponpona hongonu-laklaka me dum a'na maka edon memetma la temni rde, muat niohor neka de akamna' nana re.”
Nhor nioka Laban niwra: “Itlernohor lirmu.”
Mere ler de Laban nwakeiya pipi muan muaka roriou-ponpona, hongonu-laklaka me pipi rar mak roriou-ponpona, hongonu-laklaka, me maka memetamni la dum a'na re honona, nala la a'nani re ratiaka.
Nhor nioka Labana netlia genni olietni yala' laka lera wotel ralamni la'a enora Yakopa, noma Yakopa nod nieka pipi-dum mak kwarini re.
Mere Yakopa na'ala au akni la ora-au wotelu maka wo'rani wawahra emekto'a au knumu, nwih dodioinia au aki re ulatni pa hongonu-laklaka, nhi'nande wo'rani re nayamkeka.
Nkenia au aki rella yemun geni honona ralamni, la'pa rdella pipi-duma re matni taranni. Pipi-duma re la'pa rma remun de rmahru yalohora.
La'pa pipi-duma re ralohor la au aki re onni, de a'nani mana roriou-ponpona, hongonu-laklaka.
Nhor nioka Yakopa nker doinia pipi a'na-dum a'na rella pa rmemeh'a. Mere Yakopa nhi' pa pipi-duma mak kalohora re rapal lia pipi roriou-ponpona, hongonnu-laklakni re, me duma memetma la Laban pipni-dumni. Emkade pa nlernana pipni-dumni wokni-wokni pa nmeh'a gahani, ne edonna nkenia la Labana pipni-dumni.
Ne la'pa ler meni pa pipi tei mak karuri-ka'orta re rma ralohora, de Yakopa nkenia au aki rella pipi-dum mak kalohora re matni taranni, totpa ralohor de rehgorgorga ha'aki re.
Mere la'pa pipi-dum mak kakleh ruri rmai, de edonna nkenia ha'aki rella hande. Nhi'nande nhiuri-wnia'an mak kakleh ruri de Labana gahani, ne mak karuri de e gahani.
Dewade Yakopa re'eni-tniarnu na'ititar lol to'owa, ne ntarga ata-wa'ara patke'a rora muanke'a, pipi-duma rahu, onta me keledai.
Yakopa natlin nana Laban a'nani re rakot emkadi la: “Yakopa na' momuou oleka it amni re'eni-tniarnu re honona, ne la'a it amni re'eni-tniarnu re, pa namoria re'eni-tniarnu.
Yakopa namkek nan walia Laban gaini de Labana ematia'a ululu wut lia e'a.
Noka Orgahi Nakot la Yakopa: “Muwal lia upmu-tgarmu letni-ruhunni, me lupmu-a'namu, ne pena Ago'ru talla.”
Nhor nioka Yakopa nhopan pa rpolga Rahela nora Le' pa rmai lia wo'ora wawannu, la'a pipni-dumni genni.
Noka nakot la re: “A ha'wu miy re! A'umkek nan la ammi gaini de ematia'a ululu, mere a'mu Uplerlawanni e Nor a tialla.
Ne miy mieh' mana miat niohora, de akar tioto'ola ammi.
Mere ammi nakot nan a'u re'eni termid olekwa, de hota npairi a prehenu, mere re'eni termida olek hadi, de nalahar nan olek a wua, edon npairi a prehenu tetema emekto'a nakot targa olek mai a'u. Mere Uplerlawna edon Nolin doinia, pa nhi' yotyotni-yatyatni mai a'u.
La'pa Laban niwra: “Maka roriou-ponpona, hongonu-laklaka rde rhi'a la prehenmu”, dewade pipi-duma re honona ra'a'na de roriou-ponpona hongonu-laklaka.
Emkadella pa Uplerlawna Na'ala ammi nhiurni-wnia'anni pa Nala mai a'u.
Ler ida ne la'a ler maka pipi-duma re ralohora, de ami'a, ne umkek nana ltiata maka kalohora re roriou-ponpona, hongonu-laklaka.
Ne Uplerlawna hopopanni Nakot mai a'u lia mi'u de ralamni: “Yakopa.” Noma awuahla: “Yowa Matroma.”
Noka Naltieri: “Mrian gaimu ne mumkeka, ltiata mak kalohora pipi-duma rde roriou-ponpona, hongonu-laklaka. Aghi'a pa pipi-duma re harahu yoma A'umkek oleka hya'a-hya' maka Laban nhi' oleka tiy o'a.
A' di de Uplerlawna mak khari inonni tiy o' la Betel de, la' meni maka mual wu'ru la lairiri, ne maka mhi'a liokarmu mai a'u. Pa dodo'ondi de mpuahi'a-mpuayod pia mpuaran la' let di, muwal lia ammu-hyalmu inmu-narmu letni-ruhunni.””
Noka Lea nor Rahela ratlina Yakopa wniahaurnu pa nhorwua dewade riwra: “Papa, hota ami edon mlernana nhiakar la am mamni re'eni-tniarnu.
Am mamni mana nrekan nana ami emolmolla do'ona-dakna pa na'olu ami olekwa, me kupna maka nlernana la inon mamni wawannu de, nhorwua olekwa.
Plollolli de re'a-tniaru maka Uplerlawna Na' nana la am mamni, honona rde amora a'na mamni gahani. Emkade pa samounu de, hya'a mak Uplerlawna Nakot targa de, omliernohora.”
Noka Yakopa nwahi'a-nwayod pia nhor nioka nkenia re'eni-tniarnu ror wutga hawni-a'nani pa rha'at la onta wawannu, noka nher niana nhiurni-wnia'anni re honona pa nlernohor reria. Nodia re'eni-tniarnu, nhiurni-wnia'anni honona maka nlernana la Padan Arama, nwaror nana nla'awa amni Isak de, la'a Kana'ana nohananni-taniaratni.
<range>
La'pa Laban nla ntoria dumni re wullu la' ler de de, Rahela nte'la nana amni atiehrani (patung).
Nhi'wal pia Yakopa ntot wunwunmua Laban yoma edon nakot nohora wniarorni-wnialaini pa nawlar wia.
Emkadella pa nawlar niohora re'eni-tniarnu honona re. Nla la'pa nleretia gerlawna Efrata, na'nama rala' pa rokru Gilead wo'orni.
La'a lera mantetellu pa rakot nohora Laban de Yakopa nawlari olekwa,
dewade nodia amni-hyalli rpa rhokra Yakopa, yala'a lera wo'it ralamni, noka ndamit nana la Gilead wo'orni.
Lera nmella dewade Uplerlawna Ntutga rupni la Laban la' mi'ini id ralamni, noma Nakot la: “Labana! Mutiak samomuoga, totpa yana mukot liryata-tunyata id la Yakopa.”
Laban ndamit nana Yakopa la'a hoiwialli mak kdena wo'ora Gilead hananni, ne Laban nora amni-hyalli re mana rkeni hoiwialli la wo'or de wali.
Laban nakot la Yakopa: “Ame, hya' ed maka omhi' nana dina?! Mhuap nian a'u me mtitni-mtiauru a'nu patke'a re emeka mak ka'ara ra'ala riy pa rwutu-rkohoga!
Nihya'pa omliergot de muwunmua pa o' edonna mukot targ a'u, totpa agodi o' la muki-hepru, nhieka-tniapra tiwla-prai, ya'ana-yemnu komkoma-lewlewarni.
Ne edonna muala lera id pa akinnia u'pu rena me a'nu patke'a re. Hihi'imu-yapyapmu de podku-padku kniarni hade.
Agodi ruri-lai pia aghi' nana yotyotni-yatyatni tiy o'a, mere Uplerlawna maka ammu nkola tieru-nawur nehla, de Nakot mai a'u la'a mel worawi: “Mutiak kalwiedweda, yana mukota lir yata id la Yakopa”.
Miwlar wia, onnila ralammu nakota nawal lia ammu romni, mere nihya'pa mkiamna'a a atieh'ru (patung)?!”
Noka Yakopa nwahla Laban: “Ame, a'uwlari yoma umta'ata, yoma wniaro'ru, yanhi'pa mua' owa'an la a'namu re.
Mere la'pa atiehramu re, muhaka samomuoga la handi, ne it amni-hyalli rlin reri-rmat reri yahakmu. La'pa omliernana atiehramu la handi, mu'ala, ne riy maka nkamna'a de itwenna.” Nakot emkade yoma naplin niohora de, hawni Rahela ed maka na'ala atiehra re.
Emkadella pa Labana nler la Yakopa hoiwialli, la'a Lea hoiwialli, ne la'a hawa liahunu rora hoiwialli, mere edonna nlernana atiehra re. La'pa nhargot la Lea hoiwialli dewade nla'awa Rahel hoiwialli.
Mere Rahela na' olek la atiehra re pa nkenia la ontani wniowni nayanni, na'nama namtatan la wawannu. Laban nahak la hoiwiali honona de, mere edon nlernana atiehra re.
Noka Rahela nakot la amni: “Yana a'mu nawenna, yoma ta'en niana a'uprir lia gaimu ralamni, yoma a'g e liernana karorta-kdeha.” Ne Laban nahak samomuoga, mere edonna nlernana atiehra re.
Noka Yakopa na'ahankeran pa nora Laban rawo'or wa. Nakot la Laban: “A do'a-ha'lu hya' pa
ompuahak la a hyo'nu-hya'nu re honona?! Mere hya' ed maka omliernana la'a yohya'a no' a hoiwia'lu ralamni?! Mkenia la it amni-hyalli gaini, totpa rawerta-ratailia itro'a.
La'pa anni terampwornu de agor o' talla, ne pipi-duma rara edon eti ralamni rwasioru ne pipmu-dummu ltiata mana a'g edonna u'un nan ida.
Nhiuri-wnia'ana mak kpora-kdawra rwenna pa rlihir matmata de a'g edon godia tiy o'a, mere amueh'a ghernia. Ne maka riy ha rkamna'a la lelerni me melmelli de ompuaka nhierannu mai a'u.
Kniari nodia a lia ler pitu-ler pahna, howna-kgar, unina-umat nohora kniari,
la'pa nte' nana anni terampworu die mak adiella rommu nayanni. Akar lia o'a anni termida wehrani wogata totpa liernana a'namu re rora, ne anni wonem pa totpa liernana nhiurmu-wnia'anmu, ne re'eni termida ralamni o' edon mpuairi a prehenu emekto'a mukot targa olek mai a'u.
La'pa Orgahi-Orha'a mak khi' Uplerlawan la a u'pu Abrahama ne mak a'mu Isaka na'unni-namta'ata de edon Nor a tialla, de omuolin doinia a' pua uwal niohora lima hgal tioto'a. Mere Uplerlawna Nlinwah'a-nmatwah'a a prehenu-ma'u, meh'ru-ma'u ne Neti olek la worawi die Nawenan la tiy o'a.”
Noka Laban nwahla Yakopa: “Patke'a ri a'nu, ne ha a'nani re a u'pu, ne nhiuri-wnia'ana ri de nhiuri-wnia'anu, la'pa hya' maka mumkek nan la handi de a gah'u. Mere emkameni pa a'unetia a'nu rina me a u'pu ri honona?!
Pede dodo'ondi mai pia tsi' wutu nnio'a ida, totpa nla'a lin reri-mat rer tiy o'a mai a'u.”
Nhi'noka Yakopa na'ala wat liawna id pa nohor targa-nwau tiarga pa na'etga la hgera-lairiri.
Nhor nioka Yakopa nakot la amni-hyalli re pa rawok watu. Noka rla ral watu pa rhi'a katri'ana, noma ra'an la katri'an de onni.
Labana nala katri'an de pa nwawa Yegar-Sahaduta (yoma Laban yawalli de, nnia'eratni, lin reri-mat reri), mere Yakopa nakota Galeda (yoma Yakopa yawalli de nnia'eratni, lin reri-mat reri).
Noka Labana niwra: “Katri'an di ed mak kla' lin reri-mat rer lia omuor a'u la' ler di.” Hade pede nweta katri'an della Galed.
Ne nala katri'an de wal pia nwawa Mispa (nnia'eratni de, geni mkek reri) yoma niwra: “Orgahi Natiak reria itro'a la'pa it idma olieta la ida.
La'pa omhi' yatyat la a'nu patke'a ri ne omua'ala hapmu dom to'a la a'nu re onni, de mhuoratreria, la'pa riy edonna rdella it onni, Uplerlawna ed mak klin reri-kmat rer a'u me o'a.”
Nhi'noka Laban nakot la Yakopa: “Hadi de katri'ana, ne hadin de hgera-lairiri mak aghor taru-wuau tiarga la itro'a.
Katri'an di nora hgera-lairir di mak kla'a lin reri-mat reri, a'g edonna lieretia gen di pa alia o' de, la'pa ghi'a yotyotni-yatyatni, emekwalia o' mana edonna mlieretia handi pa omua mhi'a yotyotni-yatyatni mai a'u.
Awuakwak de Orgahi-Orha'a mak khi' Uplerlawan la upmu Abrahama me Nahor nora Terah uplerni totpena reti plollolli-rdawra mneneha mai ita.” (Terah de, Abrahama nor Nahor amni). Noka Yakopa nlokar la Uplerlawna maka amni Isak na'unni-namta'at de nanni wawannu.
Noma Yakopa ndella wo'or de pa rotan pipi-rkoki diuma la'a Uplerlawna. Npolg awoka amni-hyalli pa nora ra'an wutu, noma ra'an pa nhorwua noma ranin la wo'or de.
Repardoin yawyawar ma'ta de Laban nkinnia upni-a'nani re, me nwak pa Uplerlawna Nara'a-napalga re, nhor nioka Laban nawal lia gen miak ha ndella.
Yakopa nala' pa nodi liarni, noka nwatrom nana Uplerlawna hopopanni-lili'irnu.
La'pa Yakopa namkek nana re, dewade niwra: “Hadi de Uplerlawna kekni-rautnu rien genni.” Nhi'nande nweta gen diella Mahanaim (nnia'eratni de, rien geni woru).
Nhor nioka Yakopa nhopna hopopanni re rala' ul pua rwatroma kakni Esau, la'a Seir lowanni-ahlani, la'a Edom yapatni.
Nhopna re niwra: “Emkadilla, la'pa mikot la matro'mu Esau de miwra: “Emkadilla atmu Yakopa lirni: Adiella Labana emolmolla do'ona-dakna, me aghol lia hande pa nma ntut nian ler di.
Atiarg oleka ata-wa'ara patke'a rora muanke'a, hayori, keledai, pipi-duma, ne aghopan pa rwahaur nohor hadilla matro'mu, totpa aliernana ralam kalwiedwedmu.””
Hopopanni rlernohora lirni nhor nioka hopopna re rawal lia Yakopa pa riwra: “Amla' leka kakmu Esau. Dodo'ondi e' mana etla talan letgar pa nma nwatro'mu, nodia riy rahu wogata.”
Noka Yakopa namta'at matmiati, noma nhakr etia riy mak kora e' talla, pipni-dumni, hayorni, keledaini me ontani rla'a wok lawanni woru.
Yoma wniarorni: “La'pa Esau nma nala wokni ida pa la' yaw de, de wokni id etla pa nlewna.”
Noka Yakopa nhaut la: “Orgahi-Orha'a! Mak khi' Uplerlawna la u'pu Abrahama nora a'mu Isaka, maka kakot olek lirmu mai a'u: “Muwal lia letmu-ruhunmu, me ammu-hyalmu, inmu-narmu, lupmu-a'namu, ne pena Aghi'a samomuo'u”
Hopopanmu a' di, rimormiori tio' a'u pa emkameni pa aliernana ralam kalwiedmu? Mere ralam kalwiedmu aliernana oleka me Mdienrer lia mai a'u pede la'a ler maka alieretia gerlawna Yordan de, agod tio' a lie'enu mere ler di de, rimormio'ru rora nhiuri-wnia'anu mana riwnu-halli pede aghi'a la nhiakra woru.
Dodo'ondi mhedga a lia gera tlinni me mtiau a lia ai aratni totpena yana Esau wehlani latan nan a'u me terni ntuin nana agora ha'wu rora ri, me la' u'pu-a'nu re.
Yoma Mukot targ oleka mai a'u: “Toto' pa Aghi'a kalwieda-paitiot tiy o'a, ne Aghi'a duratmu-waitmu pa emeka eni mak kdena en hu'ula-ga'a laini, la'pa lawan rehia pa takeni rrekan nana.””
Noka mel de de ranin la gen miaka Yakop nsumbain de. Nhi'noka na'ala hya' maka nodia pa nhi'a la limtutnu-limho'oni la'a kakni Esau,
pipi rara rahu woru me pipi ltiata terampworu, duma rara rahu woru me duma ltiata terampworu,
onta maka kuh mua'ta a'nani terampwotelu ra'itar wutu a'nani, sapi rara terampwogata me sapi ltiata termida, keledai rara terampworu me keledai ltiata termida.
Nal momuog harella atni-wa'arni re pa ratiaka, wokni-le'enu re meha-meha, ne nakot la re: “Mila' ul lia, me mitiaka wokni ida rletni la wokni handina.”
Nano'a mak kdella gai kenkenna: “La'pa ka'ku de nwatrom miy ne natian miy die niwra: “Matrommi he'a? Miokur meni? He' gahani nhiuri-wnia'an mak kala' ul lia gaimi rena?”
De mpiahla miwra: “Garmu mak khi' hopopna tiy o' de, gahani. Hari de limtutnu maka nala la matro'mu Esau, ne Yakopa nmeh'a ed ma'ta la li'iru.””
Emkade walia nnio'oni la hopopanni mak kodi wokni wornu, me wotelu la'pa riy honona maka klernohora nhiuri-wnia'ana.
Mere nano'a meman pa rakot la Esau de garni mak khi' hopopan la e'a ed ma'ta la li'iru pa nmai nieka. Yoma Yakopa nwarora: “Samounu de agala limtut muaka ha rodi rala' ulu re galla ghi' kalwied ralamni, nhor niampena a'umkek gaini, de ka'ku nod ralam kalwied pa nreinian a'u me edonna.”
Pede limtutnu rde rodia rala' ulu, mere enmeh'a nanin la hoiwialli la mel de.
La'a mel de de Yakopa namat pa nodia hawni re rora, hawa liahu rora me a'nani termida wehrani ida re, rleretia gerlawna Yabok la geni miaka nhi'inde riy rleretia.
La'pa nodia rpa rleret wia, dewade nod wialia maka gahani honona rpa nlereti.
Noka Yakopa nmeh'a o'ta watnu pa nwarini, ne muanke'a ida nora rwa'uta-rwatorna nek la mel tetema nodia pa lera matni npah'a.
La'pa riy de natga de ta'en niana nalernu Yakopa, dewade nrauti apitga Yakopa kowarni mak kod lia lenanni, nhi'nande kowarni toptopni natiaulu la, la'a rrora wnia'utni.
Noka riy de nakot la niwra: “Muolin doini a lia pa alia'awa, yoma lera matni npah'a oleka wa.” Mere Yakopa nwahla niwra: “A'g edon golli o' la pa mlia'awa, la'pa o' edonna muala ra'a-palu mai a'u.”
Riy de natiana niwra: “O nanmu he'a?” Nwahla niwra: “Yakopa.”
Noka riy de niwra: “Nanmu yan neka rweta la Yakopa, mere rweta la Israel, yoma omuora Uplerlawna me rimormiori mpia'uta-mpiatorna ne omualernia re.” (Yakop nnia'eratni de, pudi-akla mere Israel nnia'eratni de maka nor Uplerlawna rwa'uta-rwate'la).
Yakopa natiana: “Awuak pa mukot walia nanmu mai a'u.” Mere nwahla niwra: “Nihya'pa omutiana a na'nu?” Noma nala ra'a-pal lia Yakopa la' gen die.
Yakopa nweta gen diella Peniel (nnia'eratni de, Uplerlawna gaini), yoma lirni niwra: “A'umkek oleka Uplerlawna gaini mere a'g edonna muati!”
La'pa nto'or doini Peniel de namkek de lera matni npah'a wa, ne Yakopa nala' teka-teka onnila kowarni natiaulu.
Hade pede makdena Israel re edon ra'ana ih miaka kaduw reria kowarni nodia pa ler di, yoma Enraut nana Yakopa diaini.
Yakopa nran matni pa namkek de Esau nmai nieka, ne riy rahu wogata e rlelernohora. Noma Yakopa nhakra a'nani re dom pa rora Lea rala' rewre'wa, dom pa ror Rahela rala'a, ne dom pa rora hawa liahunu rora rala'a.
Nhopan pa hawa liahunu re rora, rora a'nani pa rdella gaini, nhor nioka Lea nora a'nani rdella to'orni, nhor nia'nama Rahel nora Yusupa rdella li'ir memna.
Ne Yakopa nmeh'a nala'a la gai kenkenna, ne nwaltiora-nwaltieman re'eni wo'it lia tani wawannu, nodia pa nla' nana kakni gaini ralamni.
Mere Esau nawlar pia nwatroma, nkolla pa nkinnia, noka rrora rko'a-rkakru.
Nhor nioka Esau nran matni pa namkeka patke'a re rora a'nani re noka natiana: “Hyalia, he'a riy mak kora o' talla rina?” Yakopa nwahla niwra: “Upa-a'na maka Uplerlawna Nara'a-napalga la a' di, hyalia.”
Nhor nioka hawa liahunu rora a'nani re rrehgor pua rwaltiora-rwaltieman la.
Lea nora a'nani re mana rrehgor pua rwaltiora-rwaltieman la. Nhor nioka Yusup nora Rahel mana rrehgor pua rwaltiora-rwaltieman la.
Esau nakot la re: “O wniarormu emkameni pede mhuopan pa rodia nhiuri-wnia'ana rpa rwatrom ulg a lia dodo'ona?” Nwahla niwra: “Totpa rlernana matro'mu ralam kalwiedwedni.”
Mere Esau nakot la: “A gah'u harahu garia, mua' reria hya' mak kdella limmu ralamni.”
Mere Yakopa niwra: “Yana. Wuakwak de yan emkade. La'pa aliernan oleka ralam kalwiedmu, de mrieiniana-mua'nana a limtu'tu ri, yoma la'pa umkek nana gaimu de emolmolla umkek nana Uplerlawna gaini, onnila mpuayow pa mrieinian a'u.
Awuak de mrieiniana nhiu'ru-nhielmu di, mak agodi oleka tiy o'a, yoma Uplerlawna Nal oleka ra'ani-pallu mai a'u, ne atiarga haneka-harahu.” Noka noria Esau pa nhi'nande nreiniana.
Esau niwra: “Samounu de twaran pa tla' rewre'wa, ago'ru talla.”
Mere Yakopa nakot la: “Matro'mu natga de keke'enku'a ri rakleh ma'ta ruri, ne pi'pu-du'mu, me sapi re doma ruruh rer mia'ta, la'pa tmahrur rer lia lera id de hota honona re rmat miomuou.
Samounu de matro'mu nala' ul niek a lia, ne aghi' kuke' pa mnapla-mnapal pa godia ulakra nhiuri-wnia'ana mak kala'a la ga'yu, ne ulakra keke'enku'a re nodia pa atie'ela matro'mu genni la Seir.”
Noka Esau niwra: “Emkade de agaltarga hopopnu-lili'iru re dom tiy o'a.” Mere Yakopa niwra: “Yan nek wa! Hornama aliernan oleka matro'mu ralam kalwiedni.”
Pede ler de meman pa Esau nawal pia nokru Seir wa.
Mere Yakopa nwaran pa nla'awa Sukota, noka nariria likti, ne nhi' walia larma la nhiurni-wnia'anni. Nreiniande gen die rweta la Sukot (nnia'eratni de, larma).
Rwatiawu Padan Aram pa rmai wia, de rodia kalwiedni-paitiotni pa rte'ela leta Sikhema la Kana'ana nohananni-taniaratni, noka Yakopa nkeni hoiwialli la let de onni.
Nhor nioka nawel niana nohanna id la Hemor upni-a'nani. Hemor di, de Sikhema amni. Gen di miaka ha nawel niana pa nariria hoiwialli la, de welli maha wawahra rahu ida.
Nariria katri'ana la hande, ne nweta pa nwawa El Elohe Israel (nnia'eratni de, Uplerlawna mak kodi plolli-ktaryatnu die, Nhi' Uplerlawna la Israel).
Ler ida ne Dina, Lea a'nani patke'a maka na'a'na la Yakopa, nla ntomra-nnah'a patke' walli la'a leta Sikhem.
Ler de de tuwgari ida nwawa Sikhem namkek nana. Sikhem di de Hemor makden Hewi a'nani ida. Ne Hemor di de mak kla' ray la let de. Noka Sikhem namkek nana Dina dewade nodia wlaria pa nareta-nahawa dawdawra.
Sikhema ralamni nal matmiati hararar de nhi'nande naltier samomuou lia, totpena harar di ralam nal nan e'a.
Ralamni nal matmiatia pede Sikhem nakot la amni Hemor niwra: “Ama, mpaka hararar di pa aghi'a la ha'wu.”
Noma Yakopa natlin nana de Sikhema nareta-nahaw dawdawra a'na pat di. Mere a'nani re er ma'ta la wo'ora pa ratiaka nhiurni-wnia'anni, pede Yakopa nheriaplin nieka hihi'a-yapyap die nodia pa hare rawali.
Noka Sikhem amni Hemora nla pa nwatroma Yakopa pa naltier niohora Sikhem wakwakni de.
Yakopa a'nani re rdella wo'ora pa ratlin nana Sikhem nareta-nahaw dawdawra ir narni pede plet pa rmai die ralamni ramehra ne rawenan doin la. Yoma Sikhema nhi' nan oleka kdeheni-ktiahlani la makden Israela. Nhiol miak emkade de yana rhi'a-ryapia.
Noka Hemora naltier lia Yakopa, ne Yakop a'nani re e ratlin reria. Hemora niwra: “Ama, a'nu Sikhem ralamni nala a'namu. Awuakwak de miala pa nhi'a la hawni.
Ne samounu de twahal keliau, miala harararmi mai ami, ne mia'ala a hararar mamni.
Mai pa itden wut lia handi pa mi'olu-mila' lola kperanni.”
Noka Sikhem nakot la hararar de amni me narni re: “Pap miy re, awuakwak de aliernana ralam kalwiedwedmi, pena agala hya' to'a maka mpiaka.
Ne mikota agala leli-maha wo'ira-wo'ir mana pena agala tiy miy, mere miala hararar de pa aghi'a la a ha'wu.”
Noka Yakopa a'nani re rwahla Sikhem nora amni Hemora de de rnairia pudi-akla. Yoma Sikhema nhi'a kdeh oleka ir garni Dina.
Noma rakot la Sikhem nora amni: “Ami edonna mhi' emkade, de mala a nar mamni la muanke' maka edonna rsunta, yoma nhiol miak emkade de molmola-mama'a mai ami.
La'a hadi nmeh'a to'owa de amreiniana wakwakmu, omuor ami tamneh wutu, de muanke'emi re honona rde rsunta.
Nhi'nanpena amala hararar mamni tiy miy, ne miala gahami mai ami, ne amora miy tsol wiutu, ne hota ita tla' wutu hairi ida.
Mere la'pa miy edon mitlin la a lir mamni, ne miy edonna rsunta, de hota ma' owa'an la nar mamni de pa amla'awa.”
Noka Hemor nora a'nani rwayow nohora wakwakni re.
Sikhem de ralamni nalmatmiati Yakopa a'nani, pede edon nalo'on pa nlernohora Yakopa wakwakni. Sikhem mana orkotkotni-ornananni la luwnu-a'nani
pede nor amni rla'a letni puohrani gaini, na'nama raltier lia ina-ama leta riwra:
“Pap miy re! Yakopa nor upni-a'nani riwra ror ita tsol wiutu la'a kalwiedni-paitiotni, miollia rpa rdella gen di, me rala' wewewar la ralamni. Gen di mana inponni ma'ta pa rdella toh?! Nhi'pa ta'ala harararni pa tsi'a la ita hawni, ne ital wali ita harararni la ira.
Onnila tatar di to' pa hare rwayow pa rora ita tden wutu totpa tla' wutu hairi ida, de de ita muanke'eni meha-meha mai it de, rsunta emekwali ir rhi'a gahani re.
Nhiurni-wnia'anni, re'eni-tniarnu re mana hota rla'a it gahani toh?! Hornama ita twayow nohora wakwakni re, totpa rora it tsol wiutu-tlet wutu.”
Noma Hemor nora a'nani Sikhema wakwakni de, ina-ama mak kma kawok la let de puohrani gaini re rreiniana, noka rsunta muanke'a honona la' let de.
La'pa lera wotellu de, leta mniotni ramehra-ramau niohora ir sunatni, dewade Dina narni woru, Simeon nora Lewi rmai die, mak kdella leta raplin niohora. Simeon nora Lewi rmai pia ra'ala wehlani pa rwenan nana muanke'a honona la' let de.
Ne Hemor nora a'nani Sikhem mana, Simeon nor Lewi rala wehlani rwenan nan walia, noka ra'ala narni Din la Sikhem romni pa rodia rla'awa.
Nhor nioka Yakopa a'nani doma rmai. Iramkek nana mak kmati re inonni na'nama reyahru let de mniotni hyonni-hyanni, hewewatni-naniayarni pa rhi'a la ir gahani yoma rhi'a kdeh oleka ir narni Dina.
Nhiurni-wnia'anni, ne hya' mak kdella let de ralamni me to'orni de ra'ala pa rodi momuoga.
A'na patke'a, upni-a'nani, re'eni-tniarnu, rheri-rhewta, la'pa hya'a-hya' mak kdella roma ralamni.
Noka Yakopa nakot la Simeon nor Lewi: “A'na miy re, miy mhi' nana oleka matmiati-molmuol mai a'u, ne mhi' weyata a na'nu la noh di mniotni, la'a makdena Kana'ana me makdena Feris. Kennama it di riy doma rmeh' ita. La'pa rawok pa ral mai it de, toto' memna ral it la yawa, ne rahoru momuou ita, agora ro'mu mniotni.”
Mere rwahla riwra: “Nihya'pa a gari miamni la rhi'a emolmolla patke' yata?”
Uplerlawna Nhar lirni la Yakopa: “Yakopa! Mpuaran pa mlia'awa la'a Betel, mdiella hande, ne muriria katri'ana id la A'u, mak kalhari inonni tiy o'a, la' ler maka omuwlar lia kakmu Esau.”
Noka Yakopa nakot la romni mniotni me hare honona mak kora e' talla niwra: “Ina-nara ama-hyali miy re, mihal doini atiehra (patung) mak kdella letgarmi, mimou-miwitna inonmi me mhiernu naniayarmi.
Mai pia tla'awa Betel, totpa la'pa aghi'a katri'ana la Uplerlawna maka katlin la a wakwa'ku la'a lera alier la klieratni onnila a'uwlar lia hya'lu Esau. Alia'a la meni-meni de, Uplerlawna Nor a' tialla.”
Noka ra'ala atiehrani meheni re, pa rala la Yakopa, me krap mak della tlinni re (maka rnairia pa rpolu-rwak la atiehrani), noka Yakopa ntamnia la au lawna id nayanni makden leta Sikhem.
Nhorwua dewade rwaran wa, ne Uplerlawna Nhi'pa riy mak kdella let paheli-ruhun patarna re, ramta'at pa nhi'nande edonna rhokra Yakopa upni-a'nani.
Noka Yakopa nor mak kor e' talla rte'ela leta Betel, la'a Kana'ana nohananni-taniaratni. Let di, rwet wal pia nwawa Lusa.
Nariria katri'ana la hande ne nweta gen diella El Betel (nnia'eratni de, Uplerlawna, mak kdella Betel). Yoma Uplerlawna Ntutga rupni la'a e'a la hande, la'a ler maka nawlar dioini kakni la.
La'pa Ribka in liahunu nanni Debora nmati, dewade rtamnia la'a Betel tawnu, la'a au lawna ida nayanni, pede riy rweta la au lawna yapolu-yatniani.
La'pa Yakopa nma nwatiawua Padan Arama, noma Uplerlawna Ntutga rupni la, ne Nal nanni warwuaru me Nara'a-napalga, Niwra: “Yakopa! Nanmu Yakopa, mere dodo'ondi de nanmu atia' Yakopa, mere Israel.” Emkadella pa Uplerlawna Nala pa nwawa Israel.
<range>
Uplerlawna lirni: “A' di de Uplerlawna mak kodi plolli-ktaryatnu. Mu'upa-mu'a'na, mpueha-mliawna hairi ida, la'pa hairi-hairi wokni-le'enu ida nwatiawu o'a, ne ray-ray mana rwatiawu o'a.
Ne noh di maka Agal oleka la Abrahama me Isaka, hota Agala tiy o'a me la'a duratmu-waitmu.”
Uplerlawna Naltieri pa nhorwua noka Nha'at la Ilyamou-Watyatoha, Naltarga Yakopa la gen miaka Ha Nal lirni la.
Nhor nioka Yakopa nohor targa hgera watu lairiri la gen die, noka nala himima-rere'a anggur pa rhuria me nhuria wu'ru la wawannu.
Yakopa nweta gen die; la' meni mak Uplerlawna na'nama Nhar lirni de, la Betel (nnia'eratni, Uplerlawna romni).
Nhorwua dewade rwaran pa rto'or doinia Betel la. La'pa ir edon oliet ma'ta la Efrat wa dewade, Rahela namehra-namau niohora yayori a'nani mak kodi klieratni la.
La'a klieratni la ya'a'nani di, mak kodi mak ka'a'na niwra: “Mama, yan mumta'ata, ralamni di mliernan ma'ta a'na muanke'a.”
La'pa nhi'pa nwaran doinia aranni honi pa nmati nala keke'en de pa nwawa Ben Oni (nnia'eratni de, a'nu umoria la meh'ru-ma'u ralamni), mere amni nal nanni pa nwawa Benyamina (nnia'eratni de, a'nu mak alililia).
Emkadella Rahela nmat wia noka rtamnia la talan mak kokru Efrata aratni. Efrat de, rwet wal pia nwawa Betlehema.
Nhor nioka Yakopa nohor targa hgera la hoini wawannu. Hade de Rahela ketarni lairirni nodia pa ler di.
Nhor nioka Yakopa (de, Israel) nwaran pa nla nkenia hoiwialli la gen miak edon oliet la yatiak geni nio' Eder.
La'pa Yakopa nhol lia let di de nhi'noka Ruben nora amni hawa liahunu Bilha ranina, noma Yakopa natlin nana hihi'a-yapyapi die. Yakopa a'nani muanke'a rde termida wehrani woru.
Yakopa hawni Lea, a'nani yanulu de, Rubena, mak klernohora Rubena de, Simeona, mak klernohora Simeona de, Lewi, mak klernohora Lewi de, Yehuda, mak klernohora Yehuda de, Isakar, mak klernohora Isakar de, Sebulon. Gari hoho'a hade.
Yakopa hawni Rahela, a'nani yanulu Yusupa, mak klernohora Yusupa de, Benyamina. Gari hoho'a hade.
Ne Yakopa hawa liahunu, de Bilha, Rahela atni patke'a, a'nani yanulu de, Dan, mak klernohora Dan de, Naftali. Gari hoho'a hade.
Ne Yakopa hawa liahunu, de Silpa, Lea atni patke'a, a'nani yanulu de, Gad, mak klernohora Gad, de Asyer. Gari hoho'a hade. Hare de Yakopa a'nani muanke'a, maka ra'a'na la'a Padan Arama.
Noka Yakopa nla'awa la' amni Isak la'a Mamre la'a Kiryat Arba onni. Mere dodo'ondi rweta de Hebron. Hebron di gen miaka Abrahama nora Isaka rdella emeka do'ona-dakna.
Isak mormiorni nla' nana anni rahu ida terampwo'awa.
Noka Isak mana nmat wia pa rtamin wutga la upni-tgarni re. Isaka nhamto' kolkuolu, la'pa umarnu ntutu'tu noma a'nani Esau nora Yakopa rtamnia.
Hadi de Esau duratni-waitni. (Esau mana rweta pa nwawa Edoma).
Esau na'ala patke'a Kana'ana wotelu pa nhi'a la hawni. Idni de nwawa Ada, Elona makden Heta a'nani. Hawa wornu de nwawa Oholibama, Ana a'nani. (Ana di amni de Sibeon makden Hewi a'nani.)
Ne hawni wotellu de, Ismail a'nani nwawa Basmat. Basmat di, Nebayot garni.
Ada na'a'na Elifas la Esau, me Basmata na'a'na Rehuela,
me Oholibama a'nani yanulu de, Yeusi, mak klernohora Yeusi de, Yaelam, mak klernohora Yaelam de, Korah. Gari hoho'a hade. Hari de Esau a'nani maka rmor niana la Kana'ana yapatni.
Esau nodia hawni rena me a'nani patke'a rora muanke'a, me riy honona mak kdella romni nayanni, nhiurni-wnia'anni, me re'eni-tniarnu re honona maka nlernana la Kana'ana, noka nla'awa nohananni-taniaratni meheni pa naltarga garni Yakopa.
Onnila ir re'eni-tniarnu harahu rehi, nhi'nande ta'en niana rawok wutu, de gen miaka rahulti-rahamar la ta'en niana nawoka-nale'u niana re, yoma nhiurni-wnia'anni harahu rehia.
Noma Esau nhol lia Seir wo'orni.
Esau die, makdena Edom amni. Esau duratni-waitni makdena Edom, mak kdella la'a Seir wo'orni rweta la emkadi:
Esau hawni Ada a'nani de Elifasa.
Elifas di a'nani yanulu de Teman, mak klernohora Teman de, Omar, mak klernohora Omar de Sefo, mak klernohora Sefo de, Gatam, mak klernohora Gatam de, Kenas. Gari hoho'a hade.
Ne Elifasa hawa liahunu nanni Timna na'a'na nana Amalek. Hari de Esau hawni Ada upni re.
Esau hawni Basmata a'nani de Rehuel. Rehuela a'nani yanulu de, Nahata, mak klernohora Nahat de, Serah, mak klernohora Serah, Syama, mak klernohora Syama, Misa. Gari hoho'a hade.
Esau hawni Oholibama a'nani yanulu de, Yeusi, mak klernohora Yeusi de, Yaelam, mak klernohora Yaelam de, Korah. Gari hoho'a hade. Oholibama di amni, de Ana. Ana amni de, Sibeon.
Mak kla' o'ta-mata la Esau duratni-waitni luwnu-a'nani emkadi: Mak kla' o'ta-mata la Esau a'nani yanulu Elifasa duratni-waitni luwnu-a'nani re, de Teman, Omara, Sefo, Kenasa,
Korah, Gatama, me Amalek. Hari de luwu-a'na Elifasa o'tani-matni, la'a Edom nohananni-taniaratni. Hari honona Esau hawni Ada duratni-waitni.
Mak khi' o'ta-mata la Esau a'nani Rehuel duratni-waitni luwnu-a'nani re, emkadille: Nahata, Serah, Syama, Misa. Hari honona re Esau hawni Basmata duratni-waitni.
Mak khi' o'ta-mata la Esau hawni Oholibama a'nani muanke'a luwnu-a'nani re, emkadille: Yeusi, Yaelam, Korah. Hari honona Oholibama duratni-waitni.
Hari de luwu-a'na Esau, ne hare de luwnu-a'nani o'tani-matni.
Makden Hor ida nwawa Seir. Seir di a'nani mak kdella Edom lowanni-ahlani la Kana'an yapatni, de: a'na yanulu Lotana, mak klernohora Lotan de, Syobala, mak klernohora Syobal de, Sibeona, mak klernohora Sibeon, de Ana,
mak klernohora Ana de, Disyona, mak klernohora Disyon de, Esera, mak klernohora Eser de, Disyana. Gari hoho'a hade. Hare de ed maka kla' o'ta-mata la Seir a'nani ri makden Hori.
Lotan di a'nani yanulu de, Hori, mak klernohora Hori de, Hemana. Gari hoho'a hade. Ne Lotan narni de Timna.
Syobal a'nani yanulu de, Alwana, mak klernohora Alwana de, Manaheta, mak klernohora Manahet de, Ebala, mak klernohora Ebal de Syefo, mak klernohora Syefo de, Onama. Gari hoho'a hade.
Sibeon a'nani yanulu de, Aya, mak klernohora Aya de, Ana. Gari hoho'a hade. Ana di ed mak klernana ger pahna matni la wo'orletna-kawurloini, la'a ler maka ha natiaka amni Sibeon keledaini.
Ana a'nani yanulu de, Disyon, mak klernohora Disyon de, Oholibama. Gari hoho'a hade. Oholibam di, Ana a'nani patke'a.
Disyon a'nani yanulu de, Hemdan, mak klernohora Hemdan de, Esyban, mak klernohora Esyban de, Yitran, mak klernohora Yitran, de Keran. Gari hoho'a hade.
Eser a'nani yanulu de, Bilhana, mak klernohora Bilhan de, Saawan, mak klernohora Saawan de, Akan. Gari hoho'a hade.
Disyan a'nani yanulu de, Us, mak klernohora Us de, Aran. Gari hoho'a hade.
Mak kla' o'ta-mata la makden Hori, de Lotan, Syobal, Sibeon, me Ana,
Disyon, Eser, me Disyan. Hari de makden Hori luwnu-a'nani o'tani-matni, la luwu-a'na honona la Seir lowanni-ahlani.
Ray-ray miaka kodi plolli la Edoma, la' ler maka ray id mana edon nodi plolli ma'ta la Israela de:
de Beor a'nani Bela, ne letni nwawa Dinhaba.
La'pa Bela nmat wia dewade Serah a'nani Yobab makdena Bosra nwauga pa nhi' ray.
La'pa Yobaba nmat wia, dewade Husyama makdena Teman nwauga pa nhi' ray.
La'pa Husyama nmat wia Bedad a'nani Hadad nwauga pa nhi' ray. Hadi ed mak kalernu makden Midian la Moab lowanni, ne letni nwawa Awit.
La'pa Hadad nmat wia dewade Samla makdena Masreka nwauga pa nhi' ray.
La'pa Samla nmat wia, dewade Saula makdena Rehobot la'a gerlawna aratni nwauga pa nhi' ray.
La'pa Saula nmat wia dewade Ba'al-Hanan, Akbor a'nani nhi' ray pia nwauga.
La'pa Ba'al-Hanan nmat wia dewade Hadar nhi' ray pia nwauga. Letni nwawa Pahu, ne hawni nwawa Mehetabel. Mehetabel di, inni de Matred. Matred inni de, Mesahab.
Esau upni-a'nani luwnu o'tani-matni nanni, rlernohora luwnu-a'nani me letni-ruhunni, rnairi rima-rima nanni, de: Timna, Alwa, Yetet,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinona,
Kenas, Teman, Mipsar,
Magdiel, me Iram. Hari de luwu-a'na Edom o'tani-matni, rlernohora letni-ruhunni la'a nohananni-taniaratni. Emkadella Esau makden Edom amni duratni-waitni.
Yakopa nhol lia gen miaka amni nhi' do'ona-dakan la de, la'a Kana'ana yapatni.
Emkadilla Yakopa duratni-waitni tuini. Yusup, la'pa umarnu termida wehrani wo'itu, tuwarwiar mia'ta de, nhi'de nora hyalli rodia pipi-duma. Yusup hyalli ri de, Yusup amni patke'a liahunu rora, Bilha nora Silpa, a'nani. Noka Yusup nwahauru hyalli re illu-wniehwa yatyatni la amni.
Yakopa (mak Uplerlawna Nal wal pia nwawa Israel) ralamni nala Yusup la'a a'nani re korni, yoma Yusup de a'nani maka rmor niana la mto'oni-pe'eni lerni, ne nhopna rhi'a rain samomuou lia pa nnairia, maka naplalahwa me limni mana naplalahwa.
La'pa hyalli re ramkeka de amni ralamni nal rehi Yusup la hyalli korni, reiniande sukni tia'ala pa edonna rora raltier samomuou.
Ler ida ne Yusup nmi'a, noka mi'ini de nwahauria la hyalli re, nhi'nande hare yeher to' pa sukni tia'ala.
Yoma lirni rla: “Hyal miy re, mitlin teka mi'u dina.
Umkek de it erla nhyi' ralma, ne twutwut rieri metma wnioranni, noka plin-plinnianama a gah'u rapriri, na'nama miy hononmi gahami rma rtuk lia a gah'u.”
Noka hyalli re rakot la: “Hyalia, yanhi'pa omiwra mla' ray pa muodi plolli mai ami?” Pede yeher to'a Yusup hyalli re sukni tia'ala onnila mi'ini me lirni de.
Noka nmi' nan owa'ana mi'ini ida, pa nwahauru la hyalli re niwra: “Hyalia, mitlin mai a'u. A'g e mui' owa'ana, de lera, wolla me wtiona termida wehrani ida rtuk pua rru'u lia mai a'u.”
La'pa nwahauru hadella amni me hyalli re, dewade amni nal lir la: “Ame, mi'a hya' maka omi' nan dena? Pena a'u me inmu me hyalmu re toto'a pa ampaltiora-ampaltieman la o'a?!”
Dewade hyalli re ra'andoin gahani rla, mere amni nhi' targa hadella ihranu-ralamni.
La'pa ler ida ne hyalli re e rodia amni pipni-dumni la'a leta Sikhem onni.
Noka Yakopa nakot la Yusup niwra: “Ama, muat niohora de hyalmu re e rodia pipi-duma la Sikhem onni. Mai pia mlia'a re.” Yusup nwahla niwra: “Yowa ama.”
Yakopa nano'a: “Mlia' pa mumkeka, la'pa hyalmu rena me pipni-dumni e rkalwieda-rpaitiota me edonna, de muodia kota mai a'u.” Noka Yusup nlernohora amni nnio'oni pa nlergot la Hebron lowanni lala'pa nte'ela leta Sikhem onni.
La'pa Yusup nala' wewewar la wewna wawannu, dewade nwatrom nana muanke' ida, noka muanke' de natiana: “To'a, he' maka ompuahaka?”
Nwahla: “A'uhaka hya'lu re. Mtiulan pa mukot mai a'u, hare e rodi pipni-dumni la hanmeni?”
Noka muanke' de niwra: “Rwaran olek la handi wa, yoma a'utlin nana riwra rla'awa Dotana.” Noka rwahaur pa nhorwua dewade Yusup nlernohora hyalli re pa ndamit nana rla leta Dotana onni.
Mere oliet ma'ta de ramkek nan oleka wa. Mere la'pa edonna rehgor mua'ta dewade ra'an lira-remun waw pa rahak talan pa rwenna.
Idma nakot la id pa riwra: “Mimkeka, it mak kmi'ini de nmai nieka.
Dodo'ondi mai pia twenna, ne tnakul targa la gera id ralamni, demade takota tiwra pora-dawra ida nlihir oleka. Ne hota nhi'nanpena tamkek de, mi'ini edon nagengeni.”
La'pa Ruben natlin nana hare lirni die, nwaror pa nalewna Yusup la hare limni ralamni pa niwra: “Yana twenna.
Yana mtiowur rarni! Mhiopliala ger di mak kdella wo'orletna-kawurloini, mere yan memmemna mpiano'a.” Ruben wniarorni de niwra nalewan Yusup la hare limni ralamni pa nodi nawal lia amni.
Emkadella pa Yusup nte' wut lia hyalli re dewade rlehwa doini Yusup rain samomuounu de.
Noma rodia pa rla rnakul targa la gera ralamni. Gera niahi mak kerna ida.
Nhor nioka ramtatna pa ra'ana. Noka rran gaini na'nama ramkek nana mutu ida, de Ismail duratni-waitni makden Midian, mak ka'olu-kala'a. Rwatiawua Gilead pa rokru Mesira. Hare ontani re e rodia damri rora ortawi-autiawi huwua mikmikri maka welli werta.
Noka Yehuda nakot la hyalli re: “Hyal miy re, ita unutnu hya'a, la'pa it twenna wunwunmua it garni dena?!
Mai pia ita'olga la Ismail duratni-waitni re, mere yana itwano'a, yoma ita hyalli me ita ihini-rarni walli.” Ne hyalli re ratlin la lirni de.
La'pa makdena Midian re rlereti, dewade rran doinia Yusup la ger de ralamni ne ra'olga la hare, de welli maha wawahra (peraka) terampworu. Noka rod Yusup pa rla'awa Mesir wa.
Rodi Yusup rla'awa Mesir noka, la'pa Ruben nawal lia ger de, de namkek de Yusup edonna nden olek la ger de ralamni, dewade ralamni nmawal doin la pa nlihir'er rayanni,
noka nawal lia hyalli re pa niwra: “Hyal miy re, it garni de edonna nden olek la wa, pa dodo'ondi de aghi' hya'a?”
Nhor nioka ra'ala Yusup rayanni, noka rotna pipi ida tiernu na'nama rto'a rain della rara ralamni.
Rain plalahwa samomuou liawan de rhopna rla rottiarga la amni na'itra nnio'a: “Ama, hadi amlernana, pa mlioha-mlil tieka, yanhi'pa rain di de a'mu a'nani gahani me edonna?”
La'pa Yakopa nloha-nlili rain di dewade niwra: “Hadi de a'nu rayanni, pora-dawra ra'an nan oleka wa, toto' pa rlihir nana-rnai nian oleka Yusup wa.”
Dewade Yakopa nlihir'era rayanni, ne nnairi naniairi yaluli-yahon la nehlani mak kwatiawu pipi ulti, noka naluli-nahona lera-mela onnila a'nani de.
A'nani honona, patke'a rora muanke'a rhi' pa totpa ralamni makdudu, mere nwayotli niwra: “Edonna, a'ulul niekpa la'pa amuat nianpena awuatrom a'nu.” Emkadella amni nkakur nohora Yusup.
Mere makden Midiana ra'olga Yusup de la makden Mesira ida, nwawa Potifara. Potifar di nkar lia Firaun romni ralamni, de de mak khi' o'ta la mak katiaka Firaun romni.
La' ler de maka ra'olga Yusup de, Yehuda nto'or doinia hyalli rella pa nhol wut lia makden Adulam ida, nwawa Hira.
La' hande de makden Kana'ana ida nanni Syura. Noka Yehuda namkek nana Syur di a'nani hararara ida. Noka Yehuda nora hararar di rmehlima noka ranin wutu.
Patke' de na'apun wa pa na'a'na nana muanke'a ida pa rala pa nwawa Er.
Nhor nioka patke' de na'apun owa'ana noma na'a'na nana muanke'a id pa rala pa nwawa Onana.
Nhor nioka patke' de na'ana nan owa'ana muanke' ida, noma rala pa nwawa Syela. Yehuda nden ma'ta la Kesib de rmor dioini Syela.
Keke'enku'a re rlawlawan lol pa lera ida ne Yehuda na'ala patke'a ida nwawa Tamra pa namehlim wutga la a'nani yanulu Era.
Mere Era, Yehuda a'nani yanul die kapliahana la Orgahi gaini, nhi'nande Orgahi Nwenna.
Noka Yehuda nakot la Onana: “Ama, omuora yermu de muora mmiehlima, yoma o kwarmu hade la'a kakmu nhierannu totpena mimrio'a miwannia (mhi'a) kakmu duratni-waitni.”
Mere Onan natga de hota e' edonna nlernana durti-waiti nhi'nande la'pa nor kakni hawni de ranin de, de nhopliala kotnu la tani wawannu totpa yana nala durit la kakni.
Mere maka ha nhi' nan de, de yata la Orgahi gaini, noma Orgahi Nwenan walia.
Noka Yehuda nakot la yananni Tamra niwra: “Ina, mdien nek la ammu romni emeka mak kapalu, mpuei niekpa a'nu Syela nlawna,” yoma Yehuda wniarorni: “Yanhi'pa nmat wial pia emeka kakni rora.” Noma Tamra nla'awa pa ndella amni romni.
La'pa anni ida-woru nlardoin la, dewade Yehuda hawni nmat wia. Nalul pia nhorwua dewade Yehuda nor wutu talanni Hira makdena Adulam de pa rla'awa Timna, la'a mak ktoria dumni wullu re genni.
La'pa rod kiota la Tamra riwra: “Yananmu e nala' pa nokru leta Timna pa nla ntoria dumni wullu!”
Noma Tamra no'lu doinia naniairi palpuallu na'nama nnairia o'tani kniaduwni me wutnu, noka nla namtatna la nhiari mak kapal rieri leta Enaima, la'a talan mak kokru Timna, yoma namkek de Syela lawn olekwa mere edon rala e'ela Syela pa nhi'a la hawni.
La'pa Yehuda namkek nana dewade nwarora de patke' yatyata ida de, yoma nahew gaini.
